queries.accessgroupdetailsgrid: select p.PanelName as Panel , p.pnlNo , r.readername as Reader , r.rdrNo , 0 as "TimeZone" from reader r inner join panel p on r.pnlref = p.pnlno where (not (p.PanelType = 102 and r.RdrNo > 1)) and r.caObjectID in ( SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID) order by p.pnlno,r.rdrno
queries.AccessGroupList: select AgrpNo as "ValueMember", Description as "DisplayMember" from mAccGrp
queries.accessgroupquery: select PnlRef ,Agno ,tz1 ,tz2 ,tz3 ,tz4 ,tz5 ,tz6 ,tz7 ,tz8 ,tz9 ,tz10 ,tz11 ,tz12 ,tz13 ,tz14 ,tz15 ,tz16 from accgrp where agno = :agno
queries.accessgroupsgrid: select AgrpNo as "AG No." ,caObjectID AS caObjectID ,Description AS "Description Text" ,LastUpdated AS "Last Edit" from mAccGrp where nvl(pointaccess,0)=0
queries.accessgroupslookup: select 0 as "ValueMember", N'No Access' as "DisplayMember", N'AAAA' as "OrderCol" FROM Dual union select AgrpNo as "ValueMember", Description as "DisplayMember" , Description as "OrderCol" from MAccGrp where (nvl(PointAccess,0)=0) Order by "OrderCol"
queries.accessgroupsnofilterlookup: select -1 as "ValueMember", "<No Filter>" as "DisplayMember" FROM Dual union select 0 as "ValueMember", "No Access" as "DisplayMember" FROM Dual union select AgrpNo as "ValueMember", Description as "DisplayMember" from MAccGrp where (nvl(PointAccess,0)=0)
queries.accessGroupUnused: select AgrpNo as "Acc Grp No", Description from MAccGrp M where NOT EXISTS(SELECT AgroupNo FROM BadgeAccess A WHERE A.AGroupNo = M.AgrpNo)
queries.accessGroupUsagesByAccessGroupID: SELECT (SELECT Badge FROM Badge WHERE Badge.PersonID= Person.PersonID) AS Badge, FrstName ||', '|| LastName as Name FROM Person WHERE EXISTS (SELECT PersonID FROM Badge WHERE EXISTS (SELECT Badge FROM BadgeAccess where Agno = :AccessGroupID AND BadgeAccess.Badge = Badge.Badge))
queries.aclinkinputgrid: select r.InputName, r.InpNo, nvl(a.Control, 0) as Control, r.caObjectID, r.PnlRef, a.ProgNo, nvl(a.pnlNo, r.PnlRef) as pnlNo from Input r left join ActiveLinks a ON r.PnlRef = a.PnlNo and r.InpNo=a.InpNo and a.ProgNo=:ProgNo and a.PnlRef=:PnlRef where r.InpNo < 65 and r.caObjectID in ( SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID) order by r.InputName
queries.aclinkpanelgrid: select distinct P.PnlNo, P.PanelName, P.PanelType, P.caObjectID from Panel P join ActiveLinks A on A.PnlNo = P.PnlNo where P.PanelType in (3,6,8,9,10,11,12,13) and A.ProgNo = :ProgNo and A.PnlRef = :PnlRef and A.PnlNo <> :PnlRef union select distinct P.PnlNo, P.PanelName, P.PanelType, P.caObjectID from Panel P where P.PnlNo = :PnlRef
queries.aclinkreadergrid: select r.ReaderName, r.RdrNo, nvl(a.Control, 0) as Control, r.caObjectID, r.PnlRef, a.ProgNo, nvl(a.pnlNo, r.PnlRef) as pnlNo from reader r left join ActiveLinks a ON r.PnlRef = a.PnlNo and r.RdrNo=a.RdrNo and a.ProgNo=:ProgNo and a.PnlRef=:PnlRef where r.RdrNo < 65 and r.caObjectID in ( SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID) order by r.readerName
queries.aclinkrelaygrid: select r.RelayName, r.RelNo, nvl(a.Control, 0) as Control, r.caObjectID, r.PnlRef, a.ProgNo, nvl(a.pnlNo, r.PnlRef) as pnlNo from Relay r left join ActiveLinks a ON r.PnlRef = a.PnlNo and r.RelNo=a.RelNo and a.ProgNo=:ProgNo and a.PnlRef=:PnlRef where r.RelNo < 65 and r.caObjectID in ( SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID) order by r.RelayName
queries.activitylinks: SELECT m.PnlRef, m.ProgNo, m.Description AS "ALP Description", m.Priority, m.ManualPriv, m.Device, m.EventCode, m.Category, m.UnDO, m.Flag, m.RespReq, m.LastUpdated, m.caObjectID, TO_CHAR(m.PnlRef)||'-'||TO_CHAR(m.ProgNo) AS "Pnl/Prog", p.Description AS "Panel Name" FROM MActiveLinks m LEFT OUTER JOIN Panel p ON p.PnlNo = m.PnlRef WHERE m.caObjectID = :caObjectID
queries.activitylinksgrid: SELECT m.PnlRef, m.ProgNo, SUBSTR(PnlRef || ' ', 1, 2) || '- ' || SUBSTR(ProgNo || ' ', 1, 3) as "Pnl/Prog" , m.Description as "ALP Description", p.PanelName as Panel, m.LastUpdated as "Last Edit", m.caObjectID FROM MActiveLinks m inner join panel p on m.pnlref = p.pnlno where m.caObjectID in ( SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID) order by pnlref,progno
queries.activitylinkslookupjoin: select m.PnlRef ,p.panelname as PnlRefText ,m.schedule ,t.description as scheduleText from MActiveLinks m inner join panel p on m.pnlref = p.pnlno inner join MTimezon t on m.schedule = t.tznum where pnlref = :PnlRef and progno = :ProgNo
queries.agbybadgefacility: select 0 as "ValueMember", N'No Access' as "DisplayMember" FROM Dual union select AgrpNo as "ValueMember", Description as "DisplayMember" from MAccGrp where (nvl(PointAccess,0)=0) and AgrpNo in (select distinct AGroupNo from BadgeAccess where badge = :Badge and facility = :Facility)
queries.allapbarealookup: SELECT AreaNo, Description, ParentArea, caObjectID, LastUpdated FROM APBAreas
queries.allinputlookup: select 0 as PnlRef, 0 as "ValueMember", N'None' as "DisplayMember" FROM Dual union select PnlRef, InpNo as "ValueMember", InputName as "DisplayMember" from Input
queries.alllinklookup: select 0 as PnlRef, 0 as "ValueMember", N'None' as "DisplayMember" FROM Dual union select pnlRef, ProgNo as "ValueMember", LinkName as "DisplayMember" from Link
queries.allreadercolonbasisofpaneltype: SELECT R.* FROM Panel P, Reader R WHERE R.PnlRef = P.PnlNo AND P.PanelType = 3
queries.allreaderlookup: select 0 as PnlRef, 0 as "ValueMember", N'None' as "DisplayMember" FROM Dual union select pnlRef, RdrNo as "ValueMember", readerName as "DisplayMember" from Reader
queries.allreaderonbasisofpaneltype: SELECT R.RdrNo AS RdrNo, R.PnlRef AS PnlNo, ReaderName AS Reader, APBEntry, APBExit FROM Panel P, Reader R WHERE R.PnlRef = P.PnlNo AND P.PanelType = 3
queries.allrelaylookup: select 0 as PnlRef, 0 as "ValueMember", N'None' as "DisplayMember" FROM Dual union select pnlref,RelNo as "ValueMember", RelayName as "DisplayMember" from Relay
queries.alplookup: select ProgNo as "ValueMember" ,Description as "DisplayMember" from MActiveLinks where nvl(UnDoProgNo,0)=0 AND PnlRef=:PnlRef AND ProgNo<>:ProgNo order by description
queries.alpundocount: Select Count(*) as undocount FROM MActiveLinks WHERE UnDoProgNo= :ProgNo AND PnlRef = :PnlRef
queries.apbareaslookup: select 255 as "ValueMember", N'Set Next Use' as "DisplayMember" FROM Dual union select AreaNo as "ValueMember", Description as "DisplayMember" from APBAreas
queries.apbareasnofilterlookup: select -1 as "ValueMember", "<No Filter>" as "DisplayMember" FROM DUAL union select AreaNo as "ValueMember", Description as "DisplayMember" from APBAreas
queries.apblookup: SELECT AreaNo as "ValueMember", Description as "DisplayMember" FROM APBAreas WHERE AreaNo < 2 OR AreaNo > 250 ORDER BY Description
queries.assignagfromreader: select 0 as PnlRef, 0 as RdrNo, '0' as "ValueMember", 'None' as "DisplayMember", 'AAAA' as ReaderName FROM DUAL union select pnlRef, RdrNo, SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(PnlRef),2) || '- ' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(RdrNo,3)) AS "ValueMember", readerName as "DisplayMember",ReaderName from Reader order by readername
queries.audittrailgrid: select AuditId ,revisionstamp ,TableName ,OperatorName ,StationName ,CASE Actions WHEN (N'L') THEN 'Log' WHEN (N'I') THEN 'Insert' WHEN (N'U') THEN 'edit' WHEN (N'D') THEN 'Delete' ELSE 'None' END as Action ,Description ,A.OldData.getStringVal() AS OldData ,A.NewData.getStringVal() AS NewData ,ChangedColumns from dbaudit A
queries.badgecustom: select d.UserFieldName ,f.UserFieldValue ,d.UserFieldID from userfielddef d left outer join userfields f on d.userfieldid = f.userfieldid and personid = :personid and badge = :badge and facility = :facility
queries.badgeformatgrid: select Description as "Description Text" ,FmtLength as "Format Length" ,FmtType as "Fmt Type" ,FmtCLen as "Number len" ,FmtCOff as "Number Offset" ,FmtFLen as "Facility Len" ,FmtFOff as "Facility offset" ,LastUpdated as "Last Edit" ,caObjectId from format
queries.badgelookupjoin: select b.HolidayCalendar ,h.Description as HolidayCalendarText ,b.APBArea ,CASE b.APBArea WHEN (255) THEN N'Set Next Use' ELSE a.Description END as APBAreaText ,b.ShuntId ,CASE b.ShuntId WHEN (0) THEN 'None' ELSE s.ShuntName END as ShuntIdText from badge b left outer join MHoliday h on b.HolidayCalendar = h.CalendarNo left outer join APBAreas a on b.APBArea = a.AreaNo left outer join MShunt s on b.ShuntId = s.ShuntID where personid = :personid and badge = :badge and facility = :facility
queries.ca_vw_AccessGroup_Rep: SELECT AgrpNo , "Access Group" , "Last Edit" , Panel , "Panel Description" , Reader , "Reader Description" , "Time Zone" from ca_vw_AccessGroup_Rep
queries.ca_vw_ActivityLinks_Rep: select PnlRef ,Panel ,ProgNo ,"Link Program Description" ,Event ,Alert Priority ,Last Edit ,Category ,Device ,Control ,"Relay Description" from ca_vw_ActivityLinks_Rep
queries.ca_vw_Personnel_Rep: select Name ,Facility ,Badge ,Access Group ,Re-Issue ,Embossed # ,Access Date ,Validate On ,InValidate On ,AccessTime ,Last Edited ,Last Access ,Category1 ,Category2 ,Category3 ,Category4 ,Category5 ,Category6 ,Category7 ,Category8 ,Category9 ,Category10 ,Category11 ,Category12 ,Category13 ,Category14 ,Category15 ,Category16 ,"Holiday Group" ,Dept ,Phone ,Location ,Supervsr ,Ext ,License ,Vehicle ,Hire Date ,SSN ,"Company ID" ,Remarks ,Escorted ,Enabled ,Tracked ,Resident ,InitLoad ,Door Shnt ,MApbExempt ,NAPCO Permission from ca_vw_Personnel_Rep
queries.categorycounterlookup: select CatNo as "ValueMember", Description as "DisplayMember" from categorycounters
queries.categorycountersgrid: select pnlNo as Panel, description, caObjectId from categorycounters
queries.checkforelevator: SELECT PnlNo FROM Panel WHERE Enabled=1 AND Elevators=1
queries.checkforholiday: Select Holno from Holiday WHERE CalendarNo=0 AND DateDiff(dd,SDate,SYSTIMESTAMP) = 0 AND (FrHr< :FrHr OR (FrHr= :FrHr AND FrMin<= :FrMin )) AND ((EndHr=0 AND EndMin=0) OR (EndHr>:EndHr ) OR (EndHr= :EndHr AND EndMin > :EndMin))
queries.ComGrid: SELECT HCSNo as "No:", Description as "Description Text", LastUpdated as "Last Edit", caObjectID FROM MCom
queries.comlookup: select comport as "ValueMember", comport as "DisplayMember" , HCSNo from com order by comport
queries.companyidlookup: select CompanyID as "ValueMember" , CompanyName as "DisplayMember" from CompanyInfo
queries.comserver: SELECT ComID, WorkstationID, Record, Val1, Val2, Val3, Val4, Val5, Pkt, LastUpdated FROM ComServer WHERE WorkstationID = :HCSNo
queries.comxpanelbycluster: Select Distinct c.HCSNo, c.Comport, c.Baud, c.Type, c.PWD, IPAddress, c.BinaryMode, c.NoPolling from COM c INNER JOIN PANEL p ON c.HCSNo = p.HCSNo AND c.ComPort = p.ComPort WHERE p.Enabled = 1 AND c.Type != 0 AND c.HCSNo = :HCSNo
queries.comxpanelbyclusterpnlno: SELECT c.HCSNo, c.comport, c.baud, c.type, c.pwd, c.IPAddress, c.binarymode, c.NoPolling FROM COM c INNER JOIN PANEL p ON c.HCSNo= p.HCSNo AND c.ComPort= p.ComPort WHERE p.enabled= 1 AND c.type != 0 AND c.HCSNo= :HCSNo AND p.pnlno = :pnlno
queries.dedicatedaccessgrid: select p.PanelName as Panel , p.pnlNo , r.readername as Reader , r.rdrNo , 0 as TimeZone from reader r inner join panel p on r.pnlref = p.pnlno where r.caObjectID in ( SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID) order by p.pnlno,r.rdrno
queries.deleteactivelinks: delete ActiveLinks where pnlref = :pnlref and progno = :progNo and pnlno = :pnlno
queries.departmentlookup: select DepartmentID as "ValueMember" , DepartmentName as "DisplayMember" from DepartmentInfo
queries.DeviceList: SELECT IID, PanelId, DeviceId, Description, DeviceType, MapId, MapName FROM ca_vw_DeviceInfo
queries.devicelookup: select PnlRef, InpNo as "ValueMember", InputName as DisplayMenber FROM Input
queries.DisableBadge: UPDATE badge SET Enabled = 0, Flag = 1, LastUpdated = :LastUpdated , LastOperator =:LastOperator , LastWorkstation =:LastWorkstation WHERE Facility = :Facility AND Badge = :Badge
queries.DisablePerson: UPDATE badge SET Enabled = 0, Flag = 1, LastUpdated = :LastUpdated , LastOperator =:LastOperator , LastWorkstation =:LastWorkstation WHERE PersonID = :PersonID
queries.DisableSchedule: Update AlarmLink_Schedule set ScheduleEnabled = 0, LastUpdated = :LastUpdated where ScheduleID = :ScheduleID
queries.downloadaccessgroups: SELECT PnlRef,Agno,Changed,Tz1,Tz2,Tz3,Tz4,Tz5,Tz6,Tz7,Tz8,Tz9,Tz10,Tz11,Tz12,Tz13,Tz14,Tz15,Tz16,Flag,caObjectID FROM AccGrp WHERE PnlRef= :PnlRef AND AgNo>= :AgNo ORDER BY AgNo
queries.downloadalp: SELECT ProgNo,RelNo,Control FROM ActiveLinks WHERE PnlRef= :PnlRef AND PnlRef = PnlNo AND ProgNo>= :ProgNo ORDER BY ProgNo
queries.downloadcat: SELECT PnlNo,CatNo,LowWater,hiWater,EventMsg FROM CategoryCounters WHERE PnlNo= :PnlNo AND CatNo = :CatNo
queries.downloadelevators: SELECT PnlRef, RdrRef, AccGroup, RelayNumber FROM ElevAg WHERE PnlRef= :PnlRef and RdrRef>= :RdrRef ORDER BY RdrRef,AccGroup
queries.downloadevt:
SELECT ProgNo,Device,EventCode,Category,UnDo FROM MActiveLinks WHERE
PnlRef= :PnlRef AND ProgNo>= :ProgNo ORDER BY ProgNo
queries.downloadfacility: SELECT PnlRef,Facil1,Facil2,Facil3,Facil4,Facil5,Facil6,Facil7,Facil8,Facil9,Facil10 FROM Facility WHERE PnlRef= :PnlRef ORDER BY PnlRef
queries.downloadformat: SELECT FmtNo,Description,FmtLength,FmtType,FmtSS,FmtSSO,FmtES,FmtESO,FmtFS,FmtFSO,FmtCLen,FmtCOff,FmtILen,FmtIOff,FmtFLen,FmtFOff, FmtDLen,FmtDOff,FmtCSLen,FmtCSOff,FmtPILen,FmtPIOff,FmtOCLen,FmtOCOff,FmtOILen,FmtOIOff,FmtPOALen,FmtPOAOff FROM Format WHERE FmtNo>= :FmtNo ORDER BY FmtNo
queries.downloadinputs: SELECT PnlRef,InpNo,Enabled,NormOpen,Supervised,NoXact,AbnormDial,NormDial,ConRelay,InpTz,InpDelay,InpReset,AlertLimit,LimitSchedule FROM Input WHERE PnlRef=:PnlRef AND InpNo>= :InpNo ORDER BY PnlRef,InpNo
queries.downloadlinks: SELECT PnlRef,ProgNo,Enabled,Dialup,RptXact,LinkName as Description,Status,LnkPnl,LnkProg,ETz,TrkTZ,Inp1,Inp2,Inp3,Inp4,Inp5,On1,On2,On3,On4,On5,Off1,Off2,Off3,Off4,Off5,Trk1,Trk2,Trk3,Trk4,Trk5 FROM Link WHERE PnlRef= :PnlRef AND ProgNo>= :ProgNo ORDER BY ProgNo
queries.downloadreaders: SELECT r.PnlRef,r.RdrNo,Enabled,RptByp,BypUnlock,OpnWait,NoOTL,NoXact,Escort,ManRule,ExtShunt,TZOvr,APBOvr,Keypad,NoDuress,CRForced,CROtl,CRDuress,CRTrack,CRVoid,CRApb,CRDenied,Ctz,Cctz,Cytz,Fatz,Fdd,Otl,Dst,APBType,TAType,LockCtl,Sensor,Strike,Bypass,Shunt,DurUse,Cyph,Type,MapId,DeviceId,DegrSchedule,ShuntTime,ManualPriv,TagTimeout,APBEntry,APBExit,CatCode,CatFilter,Category1,Category2,Category3,Category4,Category5,Category6,Category7,Category8,Category9,Category10,Category11,Category12,Category13,Category14,Category15,Category16,RepeatOTL,OTLSchedule,NAPCOAreas,TAAPBType, ValidPrior,DUPrior,TrkPrior,VPrior,APBPrior,BypPrior,FDPrior,FreePrior,OTLPrior,BadgeUseRegister FROM Reader r LEFT JOIN ReaderPriority p ON r.PnlRef = p.PnlRef and r.RdrNo=p.RdrNo WHERE r.PnlRef= :PnlRef AND r.RdrNo>=:RdrNo ORDER BY r.RdrNo
queries.downloadrelays: SELECT PnlRef,RelNo,RelayName as Description,Enabled,XactRpt,Dialup,NormOn,RelTime,TrackTz,Priority FROM Relay WHERE PnlRef= :PnlRef AND RelNo>= :RelNo ORDER BY PnlRef,RelNo
queries.downloadschedules: SELECT TzNo,DayFrom,DayTo,FrHr,FrMin,ToHr,ToMin,m.HolGroups FROM Timezone t LEFT JOIN MTimezon m ON t.TzNo=m.TzNum WHERE TzNo>= :TzNo ORDER BY TzNo
queries.dvrcameralookup: Select DvrCameraID as "ValueMember", CameraName as "DisplayMember" ,EnableNotification,TzNo,Priority,caObjectID From DvrCamera Where DvrServerID = :ServerID
queries.dvrconfiglookup: select DvrID as "ValueMember", ServerName as "DisplayMember" from DvrConfig
queries.elevaglookup: SELECT PnlRef,RdrRef,AccGroup,RelayNumber FROM ElevAG Where PnlRef = :PnlRef ANd RdrRef=:RdrRef order by AccGroup,RelayNumber
queries.elevlookup: SELECT a.AgNo, m.Description as "Access Group",t.Description as "Time Schedule" from AccGrp a INNER JOIN MAccGrp m ON m.AgrpNo = a.AgNo INNER JOIN MTimezon t ON t.TzNum = a.Tz{0} WHERE a.AgNo < 4095 and PnlRef = :PnlRef AND Tz{0} <> 0 ORDER BY m.AGrpNo
queries.EnableBadge: UPDATE badge SET Enabled = 1, Flag = 1, LastUpdated = :LastUpdated , LastOperator =:LastOperator , LastWorkstation =:LastWorkstation WHERE Facility = :Facility AND Badge = :Badge
queries.EnablePerson: UPDATE badge SET Enabled =1, Flag = 1, LastUpdated = :LastUpdated , LastOperator =:LastOperator , LastWorkstation =:LastWorkstation WHERE PersonID = :PersonID
queries.eventlookup: select EventCode as "ValueMember", Description as "DisplayMember" , EventCat from ALPEventTypes order by Description
queries.facilitycodegrid: select PnlRef as Panel ,Facil1 as "Facility 1" ,Facil2 as "Facility 2" ,Facil3 as "Facility 3" ,Facil4 as "Facility 4" ,Facil5 as "Facility 5" ,Facil6 as "Facility 6" ,Facil7 as "Facility 7" ,Facil8 as "Facility 8" ,Facil9 as "Facility 9" ,Facil10 as "Facility 10" , LastUpdated as "Last Edit" , caObjectID from facility
queries.facilitylookupjoin: select f.PnlRef ,p.PanelName as PnlRefText from facility f inner join panel p on f.PnlRef = p.PnlNo where f.PnlRef = :PnlRef
queries.formatlookupjoin: select fmtType ,case fmtType WHEN (0) THEN 'ABA' WHEN (1) THEN 'ABA - No Degrade' WHEN (2) THEN 'Non ABA' WHEN (3) THEN 'Non ABA - No Degrade' WHEN (4) THEN 'Insertion' WHEN (5) THEN 'Insertion - No Degrade' WHEN (6) THEN 'Key' WHEN (7) THEN 'Key - No Degrade' WHEN (8) THEN 'FacBadge' WHEN (9) THEN 'FacBadge - No Degrade' END as fmtTypeText from format where fmtNo = :fmtNo
queries.getallpartitions: Select PartitionID,PartitionName From Partition p Where PartitionID not in (Select PartitionID From OperatorPartitions Where OperatorID = :OperatorID) Order By PartitionID
queries.getassignedpartitions: Select Distinct P.PartitionID,PartitionName From Partition P,OperatorPartitions OP Where OP.OperatorID = :OperatorID AND P.PartitionID = OP.PartitionID
queries.getassignedroles: select g.displayName,r.RoleID,r.pluginId from roleplugins r inner join guiplugins g on r.pluginid = g.pluginid where r.roleid = :roleid order by g.displayname
queries.GetBadgeFormatLookup: SELECT Format_ID AS "ValueMember", Format_Name AS "DisplayMember" FROM EPI_FORMAT
queries.GetBadgeTemplate: SELECT EPI_FORMAT.Format_ID, EPI_FORMAT.Format_Name, EPI_FORMAT.Format_Layout, EPI_FORMAT.templateFileID, epiFiles.templateFileData FROM EPI_FORMAT INNER JOIN epiFiles ON EPI_FORMAT.templateFileID = epiFiles.templateFileID WHERE (EPI_FORMAT.Format_ID = :Format_ID)
queries.getcatchange: SELECT CatNo,LowWater,hiWater,EventMsg FROM CategoryCounters WHERE PnlNo= :PnlNo AND Flag = 1 AND CatNo >= :CatNo
queries.getcoreobjectdeflist: select objectType, objectTypeName, editorFullClassName, quickFullClassName, parentObjectType, treeResultsQuery, parentTreeResultsQuery, showAddNewMenu, allowChildrenIfNew, showChildPlaceholders, showShowUsageMenu ,showShowEventMenu from coreObjectDefs order by parentObjectType, objectType
queries.GetCounterValue: SELECT counterVal FROM ScriptCounters WHERE CounterName = :CounterName
queries.getdialupcount: SELECT Count(*) as count FROM ComServer WHERE Record = -25 AND val1 = :val1
queries.getdialupdevice: SELECT DevIdOut FROM Nodes WHERE NodeId = :NodeId AND HCSNo = :HCSNo
queries.getdialupinfo: SELECT NodeId,NodeName as Description,Phone,HCSNo,Schedule,Frequency,Setup1,Setup2,DevIdIn,DevIdOut,Status,Flag,HostPhone1,HostPhone2,LastUpdated FROM Nodes WHERE NodeId = :NodeId AND HCSNo = :HCSNo
queries.GetEpiBadgeFormat: SELECT EPI_FORMAT_ID FROM Badge WHERE (PersonID = :PersonID) AND (Badge = :Badge) AND (Facility = :Facility)
queries.GetEpiBadgeImageData: SELECT PersonID, ImageTypeID, BadgeImage, LastWorkStation, LastOperator, LastUpdates FROM BadgePhoto WHERE (PersonID = :PersonID)
queries.GetEpiImageType: SELECT Image_ID, Image_Name, Image_Format_Scheme, Image_Max_Size, Image_Format, Image_Format_BitDepth, Image_Format_Quality, Image_Format_Subsample, Image_Aspect_X, Image_Aspect_Y, Image_Thumbnail_Width, Image_Thumbnail_Height, Image_Storage_Scheme, Image_Storage_Path, Image_Storage_AutoSubDirs FROM GA_IMAGEINFO
queries.getEventClassNames: Select EventClassName From EventClassDefs where EventClassCategoryID = :CatID
queries.GetGlobalActiveLinks: SELECT a.PnlNo,a.RelNo,a.RdrNo,a.InpNo,a.CatNo,a.Control, p.HCSNo FROM ActiveLinks a INNER JOIN Panel p ON p.PnlNo = a.PnlNo WHERE a.PnlRef = @PnlRef AND a.ProgNo = @ProgNo AND a.PnlRef <> a.PnlNo
queries.GetGlobalVariables: select variableValue From GlobalVariables Where VariableName = :VariableName
queries.getinputinfo:
SELECT InputName as Description,DvrServerID, VideoEventType, EnableRecording
FROM Input WHERE PnlRef = :PnlRef AND InpNo =:InpNo
queries.getlinkinfo: SELECT RptXact,LinkName as Description FROM Link WHERE PnlRef= :PnlRef AND ProgNo>= :ProgNo
queries.GetMessageTemplate: Select Subject, Body, allowSNPP, allowEmail,allowSMS,include From MessageTemplates where templateID = :templateID
queries.GetNapcoUserForBadge: SELECT UserNumber FROM napcoPanelUsers WHERE AlarmPanelID = :AlarmPanelID AND Facility = :Facility AND Badge = :Badge
queries.getnextserver: SELECT * FROM ( ComID,WorkstationID,Record,Val1,Val2,Val3,Val4,Val5,pkt,LastUpdated FROM ComServer WHERE Record <> 0 ) T1 WHERE RowNum = 1
queries.getnodeinfo: SELECT NodeId,NodeName as Description,Phone,HCSNo,Schedule,Frequency,Setup1,Setup2,DevIdIn,DevIdOut,Status,Flag,HostPhone1,HostPhone2,LastUpdated FROM Nodes WHERE HCSNo = :HCSNo
queries.getonepartition: Select PartitionID,PartitionName from Partition Where PartitionID = :PartitionID
queries.GetOperatorMessageSettings: SELECT OperUseSNPP, OperUseEmail, EmailID, OperSNPPHostID, PagerID,OperUseSMS,OperSMSHostID, PhoneNo FROM Operators WHERE OperatorID = :OperatorID
queries.getoperatorprivileges: Select ObjectName From ScreenObjects sb,OperatorPrivileges Op Where op.ScreenID = sb.ScreenID and op.ScreenObjectID=sb.ScreenObjectID And OperatorID =:OperatorID And sb.ScreenID = :ScreenID
queries.getpanelfornode: select PnlNo ,PanelName ,PanelName as Description ,Address ,ComPort ,HCSNo ,Enabled ,Interactive ,NoFail ,XactSize ,Node ,Flag ,MapId ,DeviceId ,CommPrior ,DwnLoadPrior ,PwrPrior ,Schedules ,Elevators ,ModemPrior ,Passwrd ,CurrentPwd ,DegradeMode ,AGSize ,Location ,Remarks ,PanelType ,caObjectID ,MaxAlp ,MaxEvt ,DefaultCalendar ,NAPCOPanel ,NoPolling ,RespOffOnLine ,RespDownloads ,RespACPowerFail ,RespModemActivity ,LastUpdated FROM Panel WHERE Enabled = 1 AND Node = :Node
queries.getphones: SELECT HostPhone1, HostPhone2 FROM Nodes WHERE NodeId = :NodeId AND HCSNo = :HCSNo
queries.GetPhoto: SELECT PersonID, ImageTypeID, BadgeImage, LastWorkStation, LastOperator, LastUpdates FROM BadgePhoto WHERE (ImageTypeID = 0) AND (PersonID = :PersonID)
queries.getreaderinfo: SELECT r.ReaderName as Description, r.Type, r.APBEntry, r.APBExit, r.APBType ,r.RespForcedDoor ,r.RespOTL ,r.RespDuress ,r.RespTrackedBadge ,r.RespVoidBadge ,r.RespAPBViolate ,r.RespOtherDenied ,r.RespBypass ,r.RespFreeAccess ,r.RespManualDoorCtrl ,r.RespCommonCode ,r.RespValidAccess /*,c.CCTV_ValidAccess ,c.CCTV_VoidBadges ,c.CCTV_Duress ,c.CCTV_ForcedDoor ,c.CCTV_TrackedBadges ,c.CCTV_Bypass ,c.CCTVId ,c.DvrServerID ,c.VideoPriorityFrom ,c.VideoPriorityTo*/ ,p.ValidPrior FROM Reader r /*inner join cctvreader c on r.pnlref= c.pnlref and r.rdrno = c.rdrno*/ inner join ReaderPriority p on r.pnlref= p.pnlref and r.rdrno = p.rdrno WHERE r.PnlRef = :PnlRef AND r.RdrNo = :RdrNo
queries.getrelayinfo: SELECT RelayName as Description FROM Relay WHERE PnlRef= :PnlRef AND RelNo>= :RelNo
queries.getremotelink: SELECT LnkPnl,LnkProg FROM Link WHERE PnlRef= :PnlRef AND ProgNo>= :ProgNo
queries.getschedchgend: SELECT StartDate,SchId,EndDate,Device,PnlNo,DeviceNo,GroupNo,Schedule,FieldNo,Description,GroupName,IsActive,BadgeFrom,BadgeTo,FieldIn,ValueIn,FieldOut,ValueOut,Status FROM SchedEvent WHERE Status < 4 AND EndDate < :EndDate ORDER BY StartDate, SchID
queries.getschedchgstart: SELECT StartDate,SchId,EndDate,Device,PnlNo,DeviceNo,GroupNo,Schedule,FieldNo,Description,GroupName,IsActive,BadgeFrom,BadgeTo,FieldIn,ValueIn,FieldOut,ValueOut,Status FROM SchedEvent WHERE Status < 2 and Device < 10 and StartDate <= :StartDate ORDER BY StartDate, SchID
queries.getscreenobjects: Select ScreenObjectId,ObjectName From ScreenObjects Where ScreenID = :ScreenID
queries.getservernot16: SELECT TOP 1 ComID,WorkstationID,Record,Val1,Val2,Val3,Val4,Val5,pkt,LastUpdated FROM ComServer WHERE Record <> 0 AND Record <> 16
queries.getserverval2equal: SELECT ComID,WorkstationID,Record,Val1,Val2,Val3,Val4,Val5,pkt,LastUpdated FROM ComServer WHERE Record=0 AND Val1<>0 AND Val2 = :Val2
queries.getserverval2notequal: SELECT ComID,WorkstationID,Record,Val1,Val2,Val3,Val4,Val5,pkt,LastUpdated FROM ComServer WHERE Record=0 AND VAL1<>0 AND Val2 <> :Val2
queries.GetSNPPDetails: Select snppHostName, snppServer, snppPort from SNPPProviders where snppHostID = :snppHostID
queries.GetSMSDetails: Select smsHostName, smsServer, smsPort from SMSProviders where smsHostID = :smsHostID
queries.getsysteminfo: SELECT SysBadgelen --, UseCCTV --, CCTVPort --, CCTVBaud --, CCTVBits --, CCTVParity --, CCTVStop --, CCTVFlow --, TapiPhone1 --, TapiPhone2 --, TapiId1 --, TapiId2 --, AlertPrtyLevel --, AlertAutoDisp , AutoAckPriority , RespReqTz , TagType --, CCTVSocket , AGCountPerBadge , APBResetTime --, PrnEvent1 , UseALP , USEAPBAreas --, CatEnable , APBResetArea , UseCatCounters , UseHoliday FROM SystemSettings WHERE SysId= :SysId
queries.GetWorkstationFromPollingUNC: SELECT WorkstationID FROM scriptingServers WHERE PollingUNCName = :PollingUNCName
queries.guiPlugins: select g.pluginId, g.displayName, g.pluginAssembly from guiPlugins g inner join roleplugins r on g.pluginid = r.pluginid inner join operators o on o.roleid = r.roleid where o.operatorid = :operatorid order by loadOrder
queries.Hardware: select 1 as Tag ,0 as Parent ,null as ComPort ,null as HCSNo ,null as PnlNo ,null as Rdrno ,null as Relno ,null as Inpno ,null as Progno ,null as mActLink ,null as CatNo ,null as Description ,null as caObjectID union all select 2 as Tag ,1 as Parent ,ComPort ,HCSNo ,null as PnlNo ,null as Rdrno ,null as Relno ,null as Inpno ,null as Progno ,null as mActLink ,null as CatNo ,'Data Channel' || TO_CHAR(ComPort) as Description ,null as caObjectID from com union all select 3 as Tag ,2 as Parent ,c.ComPort ,c.HCSNo ,PnlNo ,null as Rdrno ,null as Relno ,null as Inpno ,null as Progno ,null as mActLink ,null as CatNo ,p.PanelName as Description ,p.caObjectID from panel p inner join com c on p.comport = c.comport and p.HCSNo = c.HCSNo union all select 4 as Tag ,3 as Parent ,c.ComPort ,c.HCSNo ,PnlNo ,Rdrno ,null as Relno ,null as Inpno ,null as Progno ,null as mActLink ,null as CatNo ,r.ReaderName as Description ,r.caObjectID from panel p inner join com c on p.comport = c.comport and p.HCSNo = c.HCSNo inner join reader r on r.pnlref = p.pnlno union all select 5 as Tag ,4 as Parent ,c.ComPort ,c.HCSNo ,PnlNo ,null as Rdrno ,Relno ,null as Inpno ,null as Progno ,null as mActLink ,null as CatNo ,r.RelayName as Description ,r.caObjectID from panel p inner join com c on p.comport = c.comport and p.HCSNo = c.HCSNo inner join relay r on r.pnlref = p.pnlno union all select 6 as Tag ,5 as Parent ,c.ComPort ,c.HCSNo ,PnlNo ,null as Rdrno ,null as Relno ,Inpno ,null as Progno ,null as mActLink ,null as CatNo ,i.InputName as Description ,i.caObjectID from panel p inner join com c on p.comport = c.comport and p.HCSNo = c.HCSNo inner join input i on i.pnlref = p.pnlno union all select 7 as Tag ,6 as Parent ,c.ComPort ,c.HCSNo ,PnlNo ,null as Rdrno ,null as Relno ,null as Inpno ,Progno ,null as mActLink ,null as CatNo ,l.LinkName as Description ,null as caObjectID from panel p inner join com c on p.comport = c.comport and p.HCSNo = c.HCSNo inner join link l on l.pnlref = p.pnlno union all select 8 as Tag ,6 as Parent ,c.ComPort ,c.HCSNo ,PnlNo ,null as Rdrno ,null as Relno ,null as Inpno ,null as mActLink ,Progno as mActLink ,null as CatNo ,m.Description as Description ,null as "caObjectID" from panel p inner join com c on p.comport = c.comport and p.HCSNo = c.HCSNo inner join mActivelinks m on m.pnlref = p.pnlno union all select 9 as Tag ,6 as Parent ,c.ComPort ,c.HCSNo ,p.PnlNo ,null as Rdrno ,null as Relno ,null as Inpno ,null as mActLink ,null as mActLink ,cc.CatNo ,cc.Description as Description ,null as caObjectID from panel p inner join com c on p.comport = c.comport and p.HCSNo = c.HCSNo inner join CategoryCounters cc on cc.pnlno = p.pnlno order by comport,pnlno,parent
queries.hardwareTree_ActivityLink: select PnlRef as PnlNo, ProgNo as DevNo, Description, LastUpdated, caObjectID, 0 as IsInTrouble, 501 as ObjType, null as parentObjectID ,0 as HCSNo ,0 as comport from MActiveLinks
queries.hardwareTree_ActivityLink_Parent: SELECT MActiveLinks.PnlRef AS PnlNo, MActiveLinks.ProgNo AS DevNo, MActiveLinks.Description, MActiveLinks.LastUpdated, MActiveLinks.caObjectID, 0 AS IsInTrouble, 501 AS ObjType ,0 as HCSNo ,0 as comport , Panel.caObjectID AS parentObjectID FROM MActiveLinks INNER JOIN Panel ON MActiveLinks.PnlRef = Panel.PnlNo WHERE Panel.caObjectID = :parentObjectID AND MActiveLinks.caObjectID in ( SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID)
queries.hardwareTree_BadgeFormat: select fmtNo as PnlNo , 0 as DevNo , Description , LastUpdated , caObjectID , 0 as IsInTrouble , 507 as ObjType , null as parentObjectID ,0 as HCSNo ,0 as comport from format
queries.hardwareTree_Com: select c.HCSNo as PnlNo, c.ComPort as DevNo, CAST(c.ComPort as nvarchar2(10)) as Description, c.LastUpdated, c.caObjectID, 0 as IsInTrouble, 50 as ObjType, null as parentObjectID ,c.HCSNo ,c.comport from Com c INNER JOIN MCom m ON C.HCSNo= M.HCSNo WHERE M.caObjectID in ( SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID)
queries.hardwareTree_Com_Parent: SELECT Com.HCSNo AS PnlNo, Com.ComPort AS DevNo, CAST(Com.ComPort AS nvarchar2(10)) AS Description, Com.LastUpdated, Com.caObjectID, 0 AS IsInTrouble, 50 AS ObjType ,Com.HCSNo ,com.comport , MCom.caObjectID AS parentObjectID FROM Com INNER JOIN MCom ON Com.HCSNo= MCom.HCSNo WHERE MCom.caObjectID = :parentObjectID AND MCom.caObjectID in ( SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID)
queries.hardwareTree_Continental: SELECT 0 as PnlNo,0 as DevNo,ServerName as Description, LastUpdated,DvrID as caObjectID,0 as IsInTrouble,301 as ObjType,null as parentObjectID ,0 as HCSNo ,0 as comport FROM DvrConfig Where DVRVendor = 3
queries.hardwareTree_FacilityCodes: select PnlRef as PnlNo , 0 as DevNo , p.PanelName as Description , f.LastUpdated , f.caObjectID , 0 as IsInTrouble , 506 as ObjType , null as parentObjectID ,0 as HCSNo ,0 as comport from facility f inner join panel p on p.pnlno = f.pnlref
queries.hardwareTree_Holidays: select CalendarNo as PnlNo, 0 as DevNo, Description, LastUpdated, caObjectID, 0 as IsInTrouble, 504 as ObjType, null as parentObjectID ,0 as HCSNo ,0 as comport from mholiday
queries.hardwareTree_Input: SELECT PnlRef, InpNo, InputName as Description, LastUpdated, caObjectID, 0 AS IsInTrouble, 103 AS ObjType, null AS parentObjectID ,0 as HCSNo ,0 as comport FROM Input
queries.hardwareTree_Input_Parent: SELECT Input.PnlRef, Input.InpNo, Input.InputName as Description, Input.LastUpdated, Input.caObjectID, 0 AS IsInTrouble, 103 AS ObjType ,Panel.HCSNo ,Panel.comport ,Panel.caObjectID AS parentObjectID FROM Input INNER JOIN Panel ON Input.PnlRef = Panel.PnlNo WHERE Panel.caObjectID = :parentObjectID AND Input.caObjectID in ( SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID)
queries.hardwareTree_Integral: SELECT 0 as PnlNo,0 as DevNo,ServerName as Description, LastUpdated,DvrID as caObjectID,0 as IsInTrouble,301 as ObjType,null as parentObjectID ,0 as HCSNo ,0 as comport FROM DvrConfig Where DVRVendor = 1
queries.hardwareTree_Link: SELECT PnlRef, ProgNo, LinkName, LastUpdated, caObjectID, 0 AS IsInTrouble, 104 AS ObjType, null AS parentObjectID ,0 as HCSNo ,0 as comport FROM Link
queries.hardwareTree_Link_Parent: SELECT Link.PnlRef, Link.ProgNo, Link.LinkName, Link.LastUpdated, Link.caObjectID, 0 AS IsInTrouble, 104 AS ObjType ,Panel.HCSNo ,Panel.comport , Panel.caObjectID AS parentObjectID FROM Link INNER JOIN Panel ON Link.PnlRef = Panel.PnlNo WHERE Panel.caObjectID = :parentObjectID AND Link.caObjectID in ( SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID)
queries.hardwareTree_MCom: select HCSNo as PnlNo, 0 as DevNo, Description, LastUpdated, caObjectID, 0 as IsInTrouble, 40 as ObjType, null as parentObjectID ,HCSNo ,0 as comport from MCom
queries.hardwareTree_Nodes: select NodeId as PnlNo, 0 as DevNo, NodeName as Description, LastUpdated, caObjectID, 0 as IsInTrouble, 700 as ObjType, null as parentObjectID ,0 as HCSNo ,0 as comport from Nodes
queries.hardwareTree_Operator: select 0 as PnlNo, 0 as DevNo, OperLName||', '||OperFName as Description, LastUpdated, OperatorID as caObjectID, 0 as IsInTrouble, 500 as ObjType, null as parentObjectID ,0 as HCSNo ,0 as comport from Operators
queries.hardwareTree_OperatorInstructions: select 0 as PnlNo, 0 as DevNo, instructionName as Description, LastUpdated, instructionID as caObjectID, 0 as IsInTrouble, 502 as ObjType, null as parentObjectID ,0 as HCSNo ,0 as comport from OperatorInstructions
queries.hardwareTree_Panel: select PnlNo, 0 as DevNo, PanelName as Description, LastUpdated, caObjectID, 0 as IsInTrouble, 100 as ObjType, null as parentObjectID ,HCSNo ,comport from Panel
queries.hardwareTree_Panel_Parent: SELECT Panel.PnlNo, 0 AS DevNo, Panel.PanelName as Description, Panel.LastUpdated, Panel.caObjectID, 0 AS IsInTrouble, 100 AS ObjType ,panel.HCSNo ,panel.comport , Com.caObjectID AS parentObjectID FROM Panel INNER JOIN Com ON Panel.HCSNo = Com.HCSNo AND Panel.ComPort = Com.ComPort WHERE Com.caObjectID = :parentObjectID AND Panel.caObjectID in ( SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID)
queries.hardwareTree_Reader: select PnlRef, RdrNo, ReaderName as Description, LastUpdated, caObjectID, 0 as IsInTrouble, 101 as ObjType, null as parentObjectID ,0 as HCSNo ,0 as comport from Reader
queries.hardwareTree_Reader_Parent: SELECT Reader.PnlRef, Reader.RdrNo, Reader.ReaderName as Description, Reader.LastUpdated, Reader.caObjectID, 0 AS IsInTrouble, 101 AS ObjType ,0 as HCSNo ,0 as comport , Panel.caObjectID AS parentObjectID FROM Reader INNER JOIN Panel ON Reader.PnlRef = Panel.PnlNo WHERE Panel.caObjectID = :parentObjectID AND Reader.caObjectID in ( SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID)
queries.hardwareTree_Relay: select PnlRef, RelNo, RelayName, LastUpdated, caObjectID, 0 as IsInTrouble, 102 as ObjType, null as parentObjectID ,0 as HCSNo ,0 as comport from Relay
queries.hardwareTree_Relay_Parent: SELECT Relay.PnlRef, Relay.RelNo, Relay.RelayName, Relay.LastUpdated, Relay.caObjectID, 0 AS IsInTrouble, 102 AS ObjType ,Panel.HCSNo ,Panel.comport , Panel.caObjectID AS parentObjectID FROM Relay INNER JOIN Panel ON Relay.PnlRef = Panel.PnlNo WHERE Panel.caObjectID = :parentObjectID AND Relay.caObjectID in ( SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID)
queries.hardwareTree_Salient: SELECT 0 as PnlNo,0 as DevNo,ServerName as Description, LastUpdated,DvrID as caObjectID,0 as IsInTrouble,301 as ObjType,null as parentObjectID ,0 as HCSNo ,0 as comport FROM DvrConfig Where DVRVendor = 2
queries.hardwareTree_ScheduledChange: select SchId as PnlNo , 0 as DevNo , Description , LastUpdated , caObjectID , 0 as IsInTrouble , 508 as ObjType , null as parentObjectID ,0 as HCSNo ,0 as comport from SchedEvent
queries.hardwareTree_Schedules: select TzNum as PnlNo, 0 as DevNo, Description, LastUpdated, caObjectID, 0 as IsInTrouble, 503 as ObjType, null as parentObjectID ,0 as HCSNo ,0 as comport from mtimezon
queries.hardwareTree_ShuntGroups: select ShuntId as PnlNo, 0 as DevNo, ShuntName as Description, LastUpdated, caObjectID, 0 as IsInTrouble, 505 as ObjType, null as parentObjectID ,0 as HCSNo ,0 as comport from MShunt
queries.HcsNoFromUNC: select HCSNo,caObjectId from MCom where UNCName = :UNCName
queries.holidaysgrid: select Description ,LastUpdated as "Last Edit" ,caObjectId ,CalendarNo from mholiday
queries.inputgrid: select caObjectID ,PnlRef ,InpNo ,SUBSTR(TO_Char(PnlRef),2) || '- ' || SUBSTR(TO_Char(InpNo),3) as Input ,InputName as "Device Name" ,Enabled ,NormOpen ,Supervised ,NoXact as "No Xact" ,ConRelay as "Console Relay" ,InpTz as "Enable Tz" ,InpDelay as Delay ,AbnormDial as Dialup ,LastUpdated as "Last Edit" from input order by pnlref ,inpno
queries.inputlookup: select InpNo as "ValueMember",InputName as "DisplayMember" from Input
queries.inputlookupjoin: select i.PnlRef ,p.PanelName as PnlRefText ,i.InpTz ,t1.Description as InpTzText ,i.LimitSchedule ,t2.Description as LimitScheduleText /* ,i.AbnormalCCTVFunction ,case i.AbnormalCCTVFunction WHEN (1) THEN 'First function' WHEN (2) THEN 'Second function' WHEN (3) THEN 'Third function' END AS AbnormalCCTVFunctionText ,case i.CCTVFunction WHEN (1) THEN 'First function' WHEN (2) THEN 'Second function' WHEN (3) THEN 'Third function' END AS CCTVFunctionText ,i.CCTVAId ,c1.Description as CCTVAIdText ,i.CCTVNId ,c2.Description as CCTVNIdText*/ from input i left outer join Panel p on i.PnlRef = p.PnlNo left outer join MTimezon t1 on i.InpTz = t1.TzNum left outer join MTimezon t2 on i.LimitSchedule = t2.TzNum /* left outer join cctv c1 on i.CCTVAId = c1.cctvid left outer join cctv c2 on i.CCTVNId = c2.cctvid*/ Where i.PnlRef = :PnlRef and i.InpNo = :InpNo
queries.insertactivelinks: insert into ActiveLinks(PnlRef,ProgNo,RelNo,Control,PnlNo) select :pnlref,:progNo,r.relno,0,:pnlno from relay r where r.pnlref = :pnlno
queries.insertdialuprequest: INSERT INTO ComServer ( WorkStationID ,Record, Val1,Val2, Val3,Val4,Val5,LastUpdated ) Values( WorkStationID, -25, :Val1,:Val2, 0,0,0,DateAdd(Day,1,SYSTIMESTAMP))
queries.InsertMap: INSERT INTO Map (MapUID, MapID, MapName, MapDescription, MapImage, caObjectID) VALUES (:MapUID, :MapID, :MapName, :MapDescription, :MapImage, :caObjectID)
queries.IsUsingScripting: Select COUNT(*) FROM WorkstationSettings where UseScripting = :UseScripting AND SysID = :SysID
queries.lastvalidaccess: SELECT r.ReaderName as Description, b.LVDate FROM BadgeUpdate b INNER JOIN Reader r ON b.LVPnl=r.PnlRef AND b.LVRdr=r.RdrNo AND b.Badge=:Badge AND b.Facility=:Facility
queries.linkbypanellookup: select ProgNo as "ValueMember" , PnlRef , LinkName as "DisplayMember" from Link
queries.LinkEnabledLookUp: select l.ManualPriv,l.pnlref,l.LinkName as description,l.progno ,p.paneltype from link l inner join panel p on p.pnlno = l.pnlref where l.enabled = 1
queries.linkgrid: select PnlRef, ProgNo, TO_CHAR(pnlRef) ||'-'|| TO_CHAR(progNo) as "Panel Prog", LinkName as "Device Name", Enabled, DialUp as "Dial on Active", RptXact as "Report Activity", lnkPnl as "Lnk Panel", lnkProg as "Lnk Prog", Etz as "Enable Schedule", TrkTz as "Track Schedule", Priority as "Event Priority", RespReq as "Resp Req", LastUpdated, caObjectID FROM Link order by pnlref,progno
queries.linklookup: select ProgNo as "ValueMember", LinkName as "DisplayMember" from Link where pnlref = :pnlref
queries.linklookupjoin: select l.PnlRef ,p.PanelName as PnlRefText ,l.ETz ,t1.Description as ETzText ,l.ManualPriv , CASE l.ManualPriv WHEN (0) THEN 'All' WHEN (1) THEN 'Priv 1' WHEN (2) THEN 'Priv 2' WHEN (3) THEN 'Priv 3' WHEN (4) THEN 'Priv 4' WHEN (5) THEN 'Priv 5' WHEN (6) THEN 'Priv 6' WHEN (7) THEN 'Priv 7' WHEN (8) THEN 'Priv 8' END AS ManualPrivText ,l.LnkProg ,l1.LinkName as LnkProgText ,l.inp1 ,i1.InputName as inp1Text ,l.inp2 ,i2.InputName as inp2Text ,l.inp3 ,i3.InputName as inp3Text ,l.inp4 ,i4.InputName as inp4Text ,l.inp5 ,i5.InputName as inp5Text ,l.TrkTz ,t2.Description as TrkTzText ,l.off1 ,off1.RelayName as off1Text ,l.off2 ,off2.RelayName as off2Text ,l.off3 ,off3.RelayName as off3Text ,l.off4 ,off4.RelayName as off4Text ,l.off5 ,off5.RelayName as off5Text ,l.on1 ,on1.RelayName as on1Text ,l.on2 ,on2.RelayName as on2Text ,l.on3 ,on3.RelayName as on3Text ,l.on4 ,on4.RelayName as on4Text ,l.on5 ,on5.RelayName as on5Text ,l.trk1 ,trk1.RelayName as trk1Text ,l.trk2 ,trk2.RelayName as trk2Text ,l.trk3 ,trk3.RelayName as trk3Text ,l.trk4 ,trk4.RelayName as trk4Text ,l.trk5 ,trk5.RelayName as trk5Text from link l left outer join Panel p on l.PnlRef = p.PnlNo left outer join MTimezon t1 on l.ETz = t1.TzNum left outer join Link l1 on l.LnkProg = l1.ProgNo and l.PnlRef = l1.PnlRef left outer join input i1 on l.inp1 = i1.InpNo and l.PnlRef = i1.PnlRef left outer join input i2 on l.inp2 = i2.InpNo and l.PnlRef = i2.PnlRef left outer join input i3 on l.inp3 = i3.InpNo and l.PnlRef = i3.PnlRef left outer join input i4 on l.inp4 = i4.InpNo and l.PnlRef = i4.PnlRef left outer join input i5 on l.inp5 = i5.InpNo and l.PnlRef = i5.PnlRef left outer join MTimezon t2 on l.TrkTz = t2.TzNum left outer join Relay off1 on l.off1 = off1.RelNo and l.PnlRef = off1.PnlRef left outer join Relay off2 on l.off2 = off2.RelNo and l.PnlRef = off2.PnlRef left outer join Relay off3 on l.off3 = off3.RelNo and l.PnlRef = off3.PnlRef left outer join Relay off4 on l.off4 = off4.RelNo and l.PnlRef = off4.PnlRef left outer join Relay off5 on l.off5 = off5.RelNo and l.PnlRef = off5.PnlRef left outer join Relay on1 on l.on1 = on1.RelNo and l.PnlRef = on1.PnlRef left outer join Relay on2 on l.on2 = on2.RelNo and l.PnlRef = on2.PnlRef left outer join Relay on3 on l.on3 = on3.RelNo and l.PnlRef = on3.PnlRef left outer join Relay on4 on l.on4 = on4.RelNo and l.PnlRef = on4.PnlRef left outer join Relay on5 on l.on5 = on5.RelNo and l.PnlRef = on5.PnlRef left outer join Relay trk1 on l.trk1 = trk1.RelNo and l.PnlRef = trk1.PnlRef left outer join Relay trk2 on l.trk2 = trk2.RelNo and l.PnlRef = trk2.PnlRef left outer join Relay trk3 on l.trk3 = trk3.RelNo and l.PnlRef = trk3.PnlRef left outer join Relay trk4 on l.trk4 = trk4.RelNo and l.PnlRef = trk4.PnlRef left outer join Relay trk5 on l.trk5 = trk5.RelNo and l.PnlRef = trk5.PnlRef Where l.PnlRef = :PnlRef and l.ProgNo = :ProgNo
queries.locationlookup: select LocationID as "ValueMember" , Location as "DisplayMember" from LocationInfo
queries.mactivelinkslookup: select ProgNo as "ValueMember", Description as "DisplayMember" from MActiveLinks
queries.MapAPBAreaInsert: INSERT INTO MapAPBArea (MapAPBAreaUID, APBAreasID, MapUID, DrawingCode) VALUES (:MapAPBAreaUID, :APBAreasID, :MapUID, :DrawingCode)
queries.MapAPBAreaSelect: SELECT MapAPBAreaUID, APBAreasID, MapUID, DrawingCode FROM MapAPBArea WHERE MapUID=:MapUID
queries.MapAPBAreaUpdate: UPDATE MapAPBArea SET APBAreasID=:APBAreasID, MapUID=:MapUID, DrawingCode=:DrawingCode WHERE MapAPBAreaUID=:MapAPBAreaUID
queries.MapEventFilterInsert: INSERT INTO MapEventFilter (MapUID, EventCode, IsEnable) VALUES (:MapUID, :EventCode, :IsEnable); SELECT :MapEventFilterID=SCOPE_IDENTITY();
queries.MapEventFilterSelect: SELECT MapEventFilterID, MapUID, EventCode, IsEnable FROM MapEventFilter WHERE MapUID=:MapUID
queries.MapEventFilterUpdate: UPDATE MapEventFilter SET MapUID=:MapUID, EventCode=:EventCode, IsEnable=:IsEnable WHERE MapEventFilterID=:MapEventFilterID
queries.MapInsert: INSERT INTO Map (MapUID, MapName, MapDescription, MapImage, caObjectID, MapWidth, MapHeight) VALUES (:MapUID, :MapName, :MapDescription, :MapImage, :caObjectID, :MapWidth, :MapHeight)
queries.MapList: SELECT MapUID, MapID, MapName, MapDescription, caObjectID FROM Map
queries.maplookup: SELECT m.mapimage,m.mapname, m.mapdescription from MapPoints mp inner join map m on m.mapid = mp.mapno where mp.Type = :Type and mp.PanelNo = :PnlNo and mp.DevNo = :DeviceNo
queries.MapPointsEventFilterInsert: INSERT INTO MapPointsEventFilter (MapPointsUID, MapUID, EventCode, IsEnable) VALUES (:MapPointsUID, :MapUID, :EventCode, :IsEnable); SELECT :MapPointsEventFilterID=SCOPE_IDENTITY()
queries.MapPointsEventFilterSelect: SELECT MapPointsEventFilterID, MapPointsUID, MapUID, EventCode, IsEnable FROM MapPointsEventFilter WHERE MapUID=:MapUID
queries.MapPointsEventFilterUpdate: UPDATE MapPointsEventFilter SET MapPointsUID=:MapPointsUID, MapUID=:MapUID, EventCode=:EventCode, IsEnable=:IsEnable WHERE MapPointsEventFilterID=:MapPointsEventFilterID
queries.MapPointsInsert: INSERT INTO MapPoints (MapPointsUID, MapUID, DeviceType, DeviceObjectID, PointX, PointY, MapAPBAreaUID) VALUES (:MapPointsUID, :MapUID, :DeviceType, :DeviceObjectID, :PointX, :PointY, :MapAPBAreaUID)
queries.MapPointsSelect: SELECT MapPointsUID, MapUID, DeviceType, DeviceObjectID, PointX, PointY, MapAPBAreaUID FROM MapPoints WHERE MapUID = :MapUID
queries.MapPointsUpdate: UPDATE MapPoints SET MapUID=:MapUID, DeviceType=:DeviceType, DeviceObjectID=:DeviceObjectID, PointX=:PointX, PointY=:PointY, MapAPBAreaUID=:MapAPBAreaUID WHERE MapPointsUID=:MapPointsUID
queries.MapSelect: SELECT MapUID, MapID, MapName, MapDescription, MapImage,caObjectID, MapHeight, MapWidth FROM Map WHERE MapUID=:MapUID
queries.MapUpdate: UPDATE Map SET MapName=:MapName, MapDescription=:MapDescription, MapImage=:MapImage, MapWidth=:MapWidth, MapHeight=:MapHeight WHERE MapUID=:MapUID
queries.mcomlookup: select HCSNo as "ValueMember", Description as "DisplayMember" from MCOM
queries.mholidaylookup: select CalendarNo as "ValueMember", Description as "DisplayMember" from MHoliday
queries.mholidaynofilterlookup: select -1 as "ValueMember", "<No Filter>" as "DisplayMember" FROM DUAL union select CalendarNo as "ValueMember", Description as "DisplayMember" from MHoliday
queries.mshuntbyid: select Active from MShunt where ShuntID = :ShuntID
queries.mshuntlookup: select 0 as "ValueMember", N'None' as "DisplayMember" ,0 as Active FROM Dual union select ShuntID as "ValueMember", ShuntName as "DisplayMember" ,Active from MShunt
queries.mtimezonlookup: select TzNum as "ValueMember" ,description as "DisplayMember" from MTimezon order by description
queries.napcoareaeventdefgrid: select e.AlarmPanelID , e.AreaNumber , e.statusCode , e.GenerateEvent , e.EventPriority , e.ResponseRequired , e.relayControlAction , d.eventMsgText from napcoPanelAreaEventDef e inner join napcoEventDef d on e.statuscode = d.statuscode where alarmPanelID = :alarmPanelID and areaNumber = :areaNumber
queries.napcoareagrid: select PanelName as "Alarm Panel" ,AreaNumber as "Area Number" ,AreaName as "Area Name" ,areaTypeName as "Area Type" ,AreaConfigured as Configured ,AlarmPanelID ,caObjectId from ca_vw_napco_areaDisplayGrid
queries.napcoareas: SELECT n.AreaNumber,n.AreaName, n.AreaConfigured FROM napcoPanelAreas n INNER JOIN Panel p ON n.AlarmPanelID = p.NAPCOPanel WHERE p.PnlNo = :pnlno
queries.napcoareasactivepanelslookup: select AlarmPanelID, AreaNumber, AreaName, ManualPriv from napcoPanelAreas where AreaConfigured = 1 and AlarmPanelID in (select AlarmPanelID from napcoPanels where Enabled = 1) order by AlarmPanelID, AreaNumber
queries.napcoareasonepanelslookup: select AlarmPanelID, AreaNumber, AreaName, ManualPriv from napcoPanelAreas where AreaConfigured = 1 and AlarmPanelID = :AlarmPanelID order by AreaNumber
queries.napcoareaspecificlookup: select AlarmPanelID, AreaNumber, AreaName, ManualPriv from napcoPanelAreas where AlarmPanelID = :AlarmPanelID and AreaNumber =:AreaNumber
queries.napcoareatypelookup: select alarmareatype as "ValueMember" ,areatypename as "DisplayMember" from napcoAlarmAreaTypeDef
queries.napcoconnectiontypeslookup: select connectionType as "ValueMember", connectionTypeName as "DisplayMember" from napcoConnectionTypes order by connectionType
queries.napcoeventdeflookup: select statusCode as "ValueMember", eventMsgText as "DisplayMember" from napcoeventdef
queries.NapcoHardware: select 1 as Tag ,0 as Parent ,null as AlarmPanelID ,null as AreaNumber ,null as RelayNumber ,null as ZoneNumber ,null as "Description" FROM DUAL union all select 2 as Tag ,1 as Parent ,AlarmPanelID ,null as AreaNumber ,null as RelayNumber ,null as ZoneNumber ,PanelName as "Description" from NapcoPanels union all select 3 as Tag ,2 as Parent ,p.AlarmPanelID ,AreaNumber ,null as RelayNumber ,null as ZoneNumber ,AreaName as "Description" from NapcoPanels p inner join NapcoPanelAreas a on p.AlarmPanelID = a.AlarmPanelID union all select 4 as Tag ,3 as Parent ,p.AlarmPanelID ,null as AreaNumber ,RelayNumber ,null as ZoneNumber ,RelayName as "Description" from NapcoPanels p inner join NapcoPanelRelays r on p.AlarmPanelID = r.AlarmPanelID union all select 5 as Tag ,4 as Parent ,p.AlarmPanelID ,null as AreaNumber ,null as RelayNumber ,ZoneNumber ,ZoneName as "Description" from NapcoPanels p inner join NapcoPanelZones z on p.AlarmPanelID = z.AlarmPanelID order by AlarmPanelID,parent
queries.napcompermissionslookup: SELECT napcoMPermissions.PermissionID as "ValueMember" , napcoMPermissions.PermissionName as "DisplayMember" FROM napcoMPermissions
queries.napcopanelactivelookup: select alarmpanelid as "ValueMember" ,panelname as "DisplayMember" from napcoPanels
queries.napcopanelareaslookup: select AreaNumber as "ValueMember", AreaName as "DisplayMember" from napcoPanelAreas order by AreaNumber
queries.napcopaneleventdefgrid: select e.statuscode, e.generateevent, e.eventpriority, e.responserequired ,d.eventMsgText from NapcoPanelEventDef e inner join napcoeventdef d on d.statuscode = e.statuscode where e.alarmpanelid = :alarmpanelid
queries.napcopanelgrid: select alarmpanelid as "Panel Number" ,panelname as "Panel Name" ,PanelType as "Panel Type" ,PollingUncName as Workstation ,ConnectionTypeName as Connection ,SocketAddress as Address ,PortNumber as Port ,Enabled ,MasterProgramCode as "Master Program Code" ,caObjectId from ca_vw_napco_panelDisplayGrid
queries.napcopanellookup: select alarmpanelid as "ValueMember" ,panelname as "DisplayMember" ,caObjectId AS "caObjectID" from napcoPanels
queries.NapcoPanelNoneLookup: select 0 as "ValueMember", N'None' as "DisplayMember" FROM DUAL union select AlarmPanelID as "ValueMember", PanelName as "DisplayMember" from napcoPanels
queries.napcopaneltypelookup: select paneltype as ValueMember ,paneltypename as "DisplayMember" from napcoAlarmPanelDef
queries.napcopermissiongrid: SELECT PermissionID as "Permission #" , PermissionName as "Permission Name" , LastUpdated as "Last Change" ,caobjectid FROM napcoMPermissions
queries.napcopermissiontree: select p.AlarmPanelId , a.AreaNumber , p.PanelName , a.AreaName ,np.CanArm ,np.CanDisarm from napcoPanels p inner join napcoPanelAreas a on a.AlarmPanelId = p.AlarmPanelid left outer join napcoPermissions np on np.AlarmPanelId = p.AlarmPanelId and np.AreaNumber = a.AreaNumber where a.AreaConfigured = 1 order by p.AlarmPanelId,a.AreaNumber
queries.napcorelayeventdefgrid: select e.AlarmPanelID , e.RelayNumber , e.statusCode , e.GenerateEvent , e.EventPriority , e.ResponseRequired , d.eventMsgText from napcoPanelRelayEventDef e inner join napcoEventDef d on e.statuscode = d.statuscode where alarmPanelID = :alarmPanelID and RelayNumber = :RelayNumber
queries.napcorelaygrid: select AlarmPanelID as "Panel" ,RelayNumber as "Relay Number" ,RelayName as "Relay Name" ,RelayConfigured as Configured ,AlarmPanelID ,caObjectId from ca_vw_napco_RelayDisplayGrid
queries.napcorelaylookup: select relayNumber as "ValueMember", RelayName as "DisplayMember",AlarmPanelID from ca_vw_napco_relayDisplayGrid order by relayNumber
queries.napcoworkstationlookup: select workstationID as "ValueMember", pollingUNCName as "DisplayMember" from napcoWorkstations order by workstationID
queries.napcozoneeventdefgrid: select e.AlarmPanelID , e.ZoneNumber , e.statusCode , e.GenerateEvent , e.EventPriority , e.ResponseRequired , d.eventMsgText from napcoPanelZoneEventDef e inner join napcoEventDef d on e.statuscode = d.statuscode where alarmPanelID = :alarmPanelID and ZoneNumber = :ZoneNumber
queries.napcozonegrid: select AlarmPanelID as "Alarm Panel" ,ZoneNumber as "Zone Number" ,AreaNumber as "Area Number" ,ZoneName as "Zone Name" ,ZoneConfigured as Configured ,AlarmPanelID ,caObjectId from ca_vw_napco_zoneDisplayGrid
queries.newpanellookup: select Pnlno, PanelType, PanelName as "Description" from panel where PanelType in (3,6,8,9,10,11,12,13)
queries.newpanelsunpartlookup: select Pnlno , Pnlno as "ValueMember" , PanelType , PanelName as "Description" , PanelName as "DisplayMember" from panel where PanelType in (3,6,8,9,10,11,12,13)
queries.nodelookupjoin: select n.HCSNo ,c.Description as HCSNoText ,n.Schedule ,t.Description as ScheduleText from nodes n left outer join MCOM c on n.HCSNo = c.HCSNo left outer join MTimezon t on n.Schedule = t.TzNum Where n.nodeid = :nodeid
queries.nodesgrid: select caObjectId ,NodeId ,NodeName as "Description Text" ,Phone as "Panel Phone" ,Schedule as "Dial Schedule" ,Frequency as "Dial Frequency" ,Setup1 as "Setup Text 1" ,Setup2 as "Setup Text 2" from nodes
queries.nodeslookup: select NodeId as "ValueMember", NodeName as "DisplayMember" from nodes
queries.nodespanellookup: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Panel.PnlNo, Panel.PanelName, Panel.HCSNo, Panel.caObjectId FROM Panel INNER JOIN Com ON Panel.HCSNo = Com.HCSNo AND Panel.ComPort = Com.ComPort WHERE (Com.Type = 2) ORDER BY Panel.PnlNo ) T1 WHERE ROWNUM < 101
queries.operatorgrid: Select OperatorID, OperLoginName, CASE WHEN Enabled = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS Enabled, OperPassword, LogoffTime, AutoAckTime, CASE WHEN IsGlobalAdministrator = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS IsGlobalAdministrator, CASE WHEN UseLegacyDisplay = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS UseLegacyDisplay, OperFName, OperLName, PhoneNo, EmailID, PagerID, LastLoggedIn, LastLoggedInUncName, LastUpdated, MaxThreatLevelAllowed, CASE WHEN CanChangeThreatLevel = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS CanChangeThreatLevel, OperSNPPHostID, CASE WHEN OperUseSNPP = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS OperUseSNPP, CASE WHEN OperUseEmail = 1 THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS OperUseEmail From Operators Order By OperLoginName
queries.operatorinstruction: select instructionID as "ValueMember", instructionName as "DisplayMember" from operatorInstructions
queries.operatorinstructionlookup: select instructionID as "ValueMember", instructionName as "DisplayMember" from operatorInstructions
queries.operatorinstructionsgrid: select instructionName as "Instruction Name", instructionID from operatorInstructions
queries.operatorLoginLookup: select OperatorID, OperFName, OperLName, OperLoginName, OperPassword, MaxThreatLevelAllowed, CanChangeThreatLevel, UseLegacyDisplay from Operators where OperLoginName = :LoginName and Enabled = 1
queries.panel: select PnlNo,Address,ComPort,HCSNo,Enabled,Interactive,Node,NoFail,XactSize, CommPrior,DwnLoadPrior,PwrPrior,RespOffOnLine , RespDownloads , RespACPowerFail, RespModemActivity,Schedules,Elevators,ModemPrior,Passwrd, CurrentPwd,DegradeMode,AGSize,PanelType,MaxAlp,MaxEvt,DefaultCalendar,NoPolling from panel where pnlno = :PnlNo
queries.paneldownloadAgNoInitLoad: SELECT Facility,Badge,Pin,Issue,Enabled,Track,Resident,InitLoad,Shunt,DurUse,Escort,AccessTime,UseCount,Category1,Category2,Category3,Category4,Category5,Category6,Category7,Category8,Category9,Category10,Category11,Category12,Category13,Category14,Category15,Category16,HolidayCalendar,VehicleTag,PnlNo,APBSet,APBArea,Agno FROM ca_vw_PanelDownload WHERE Enabled=1 AND AgNo= :AgNo AND PnlNo= :PnlNo AND (InitLoad=1) ORDER BY Facility,Badge
queries.paneldownloadEnabledBadgeFac: SELECT distinct Facility,Badge,Pin,Issue,Enabled,Track,Resident,InitLoad,Shunt,DurUse,Escort,AccessTime,UseCount,Category1,Category2,Category3,Category4,Category5,Category6,Category7,Category8,Category9,Category10,Category11,Category12,Category13,Category14,Category15,Category16,HolidayCalendar,VehicleTag,PnlNo,APBSet,APBArea ,(select Agroupno from ca_vw_PanelDownload where Enabled=1 AND Facility = :facility and badge =:badge and pnlno = :pnlno AND AGSeq = 1 AND v.badge = badge and v.facility = facility and v.personid = personid) as aGroup1 ,(select Agroupno from ca_vw_PanelDownload where Enabled=1 AND Facility = :facility and badge =:badge and pnlno = :pnlno AND AGSeq = 2 AND v.badge = badge and v.facility = facility and v.personid = personid) as aGroup2 ,(select Agroupno from ca_vw_PanelDownload where Enabled=1 AND Facility = :facility and badge =:badge and pnlno = :pnlno AND AGSeq = 3 AND v.badge = badge and v.facility = facility and v.personid = personid) as aGroup3 ,(select Agroupno from ca_vw_PanelDownload where Enabled=1 AND Facility = :facility and badge =:badge and pnlno = :pnlno AND AGSeq = 4 AND v.badge = badge and v.facility = facility and v.personid = personid) as aGroup4 ,(select Agroupno from ca_vw_PanelDownload where Enabled=1 AND Facility = :facility and badge =:badge and pnlno = :pnlno AND AGSeq = 5 AND v.badge = badge and v.facility = facility and v.personid = personid) as aGroup5 ,(select Agroupno from ca_vw_PanelDownload where Enabled=1 AND Facility = :facility and badge =:badge and pnlno = :pnlno AND AGSeq = 6 AND v.badge = badge and v.facility = facility and v.personid = personid) as aGroup6 FROM ca_vw_PanelDownload v WHERE Enabled=1 AND Facility= :facility AND Badge= :badge AND PnlNo= :pnlno
queries.paneldownloadEnabledInitLoad: SELECT distinct Facility,Badge,Pin,Issue,Enabled,Track,Resident,InitLoad,Shunt,DurUse,Escort,AccessTime,UseCount,Category1,Category2,Category3,Category4,Category5,Category6,Category7,Category8,Category9,Category10,Category11,Category12,Category13,Category14,Category15,Category16,HolidayCalendar,VehicleTag,PnlNo,APBSet,APBArea ,(select Agroupno from ca_vw_PanelDownload where enabled = 1 AND InitLoad=1 AND pnlno =:pnlno AND AGSeq = 1 AND v.badge = badge and v.facility = facility and v.personid = personid) as aGroup1 ,(select Agroupno from ca_vw_PanelDownload where enabled = 1 AND InitLoad=1 AND pnlno =:pnlno AND AGSeq = 2 AND v.badge = badge and v.facility = facility and v.personid = personid) as aGroup2 ,(select Agroupno from ca_vw_PanelDownload where enabled = 1 AND InitLoad=1 AND pnlno =:pnlno AND AGSeq = 3 AND v.badge = badge and v.facility = facility and v.personid = personid) as aGroup3 ,(select Agroupno from ca_vw_PanelDownload where enabled = 1 AND InitLoad=1 AND pnlno =:pnlno AND AGSeq = 4 AND v.badge = badge and v.facility = facility and v.personid = personid) as aGroup4 ,(select Agroupno from ca_vw_PanelDownload where enabled = 1 AND InitLoad=1 AND pnlno =:pnlno AND AGSeq = 5 AND v.badge = badge and v.facility = facility and v.personid = personid) as aGroup5 ,(select Agroupno from ca_vw_PanelDownload where enabled = 1 AND InitLoad=1 AND pnlno =:pnlno AND AGSeq = 6 AND v.badge = badge and v.facility = facility and v.personid = personid) as aGroup6 FROM ca_vw_PanelDownload v WHERE Enabled=1 AND PnlNo= :PnlNo AND InitLoad=1 ORDER BY Facility,Badge
queries.paneldownloadFlagInitLoad: SELECT distinct Facility,Badge,Pin,Issue,Enabled,Track,Resident,InitLoad,Shunt,DurUse,Escort,AccessTime,UseCount,Category1,Category2,Category3,Category4,Category5,Category6,Category7,Category8,Category9,Category10,Category11,Category12,Category13,Category14,Category15,Category16,HolidayCalendar,VehicleTag,PnlNo,APBSet,APBArea ,(select Agroupno from ca_vw_PanelDownload where Flag = 1 AND InitLoad=1 and pnlno = :pnlno AND AGSeq = 1 AND v.badge = badge and v.facility = facility and v.personid = personid) as aGroup1 ,(select Agroupno from ca_vw_PanelDownload where Flag = 1 and InitLoad=1 and pnlno = :pnlno AND AGSeq = 2 AND v.badge = badge and v.facility = facility and v.personid = personid) as aGroup2 ,(select Agroupno from ca_vw_PanelDownload where Flag = 1 and InitLoad=1 and pnlno = :pnlno AND AGSeq = 3 AND v.badge = badge and v.facility = facility and v.personid = personid) as aGroup3 ,(select Agroupno from ca_vw_PanelDownload where Flag = 1 and InitLoad=1 and pnlno = :pnlno AND AGSeq = 4 AND v.badge = badge and v.facility = facility and v.personid = personid) as aGroup4 ,(select Agroupno from ca_vw_PanelDownload where Flag = 1 and InitLoad=1 and pnlno = :pnlno AND AGSeq = 5 AND v.badge = badge and v.facility = facility and v.personid = personid) as aGroup5 ,(select Agroupno from ca_vw_PanelDownload where Flag = 1 and InitLoad=1 and pnlno = :pnlno AND AGSeq = 6 AND v.badge = badge and v.facility = facility and v.personid = personid) as aGroup6 FROM ca_vw_PanelDownload v WHERE Flag=1 AND PnlNo= :PnlNo AND InitLoad=1 ORDER BY Facility,Badge
queries.panelgrid: select PnlNo ,caObjectID ,PnlNo as Panel ,PanelName as "Device Name" ,Address as "Pnl Address" ,Enabled as Enable ,HCSNo as Workstation ,ComPort ,Interactive as "Is Interactive" ,NoFail as "No Repeat Fail" ,XactSize as "Buffer Size" ,Node as "Dialup Node" ,LastUpdated as "Last Edit" from panel order by pnlno
queries.panellookup: select pnlno as "ValueMember" ,panelname as "DisplayMember", paneltype,NapcoPanel from panel order by PanelName
queries.panellookupjoin: select p.PanelType ,t.description as PanelTypeText ,p.NapcoPanel , CASE p.NapcoPanel WHEN (0) THEN N'None' ELSE n.PanelName END AS NapcoPanelText ,p.DefaultCalendar ,h.Description as DefaultCalendarText ,p.HCSNo ,c.description as HCSNoText from panel p left outer join Panel_Types t on p.paneltype = t.id left outer join napcoPanels n on p.NapcoPanel = n.AlarmPanelID left outer join MHoliday h on p.DefaultCalendar = h.CalendarNo left outer join MCOM c on p.HCSNo = c.HCSNo where pnlNo = :PnlNo
queries.panelquery: select paneltype,NapcoPanel from panel where pnlno = :pnlNo
queries.panelsbynode: select pnlno,node from panel where node = :NodeId
queries.panelswithcatcounters: SELECT DISTINCT p.PnlNo,p.PanelName,p.PanelType FROM Panel p INNER JOIN CategoryCounters c ON c.PnlNo=p.PnlNo WHERE PanelType in (3,6,8,9,10,11,12,13) order by p.PanelName
queries.paneltypelookup: select ID as "ValueMember", Description as "DisplayMember" from Panel_types
queries.panelUsagesByPanelID: select (select count(*) from BadgeAccess B INNER JOIN AccGrp A ON A.Agno = B.AGroupNo INNER JOIN Panel P On P.PnlNo = A.PnlRef INNER JOIN Badge Ba ON Ba.Badge = B.Badge WHERE P.Enabled = 1 AND Ba.Enabled = 1 AND P.PnlNo = :PanelID) TotalBadges,(select Count(*) from Accgrp WHERE PnlRef = :PanelID) TotalAccGroups,NVL((select SUM(Tz1 + Tz2 + Tz3 + Tz4 + Tz5 + Tz6 + Tz7 + Tz8 +Tz9 + Tz10 + Tz11 + Tz12 + Tz13 + Tz14 + Tz15 + Tz16) from AccGrp Where PnlRef = :PanelID),0) TotalAgBlocks FROM Dual
queries.panelxcombycluster: SELECT p.PnlNo, p.Address, p.ComPort, p.HCSNo, p.Enabled, p.Interactive, p.NoFail, p.XactSize, p.Node, p.CommPrior, p.DwnLoadPrior, p.PwrPrior,p.RespOffOnLine , p.RespDownloads , p.RespACPowerFail, p.RespModemActivity,p.Schedules, p.Elevators, p.ModemPrior, p.Passwrd, p.CurrentPwd, p.DegradeMode, p.AGSize, p.PanelType, p.MaxAlp, p.MaxEvt, p.DefaultCalendar,p.NoPolling, c.type FROM PANEL p INNER JOIN COM c ON p.HCSNo= c.HCSNo AND p.ComPort= c.ComPort WHERE p.HCSNo= :HCSNo AND p.enabled= 1
queries.panelxcombypanelno: SELECT p.PnlNo, p.Address, p.ComPort, p.HCSNo, p.Enabled, p.Interactive, p.NoFail, p.XactSize, p.Node, p.CommPrior, p.DwnLoadPrior, p.PwrPrior,p.RespOffOnLine , p.RespDownloads , p.RespACPowerFail, p.RespModemActivity, p.Schedules, p.Elevators, p.ModemPrior, p.Passwrd, p.CurrentPwd, p.DegradeMode, p.AGSize, p.PanelType, p.MaxAlp, p.MaxEvt, p.DefaultCalendar,p.NoPolling, c.type FROM PANEL p INNER JOIN COM c ON p.HCSNo= c.HCSNo AND p.ComPort= c.ComPort WHERE p.PnlNo= :PnlNo AND p.enabled= 1
queries.personlookupjoin: select p.NAPCOPermissionId ,n.PermissionName as NAPCOPermissionIdText ,p.CompanyID ,c.CompanyName as CompanyIDText ,p.deptid ,d.departmentname as deptidText ,p.locationid ,l.location as locationidText ,p.SupervisorId ,s.LastName || ', ' || s.FrstName as SupervisorIdText ,p.gender ,CASE TO_CHAR(p.gender) WHEN ('0') THEN 'Unspecified' WHEN ('1') THEN 'Male' WHEN ('2') THEN 'Female' ELSE 'Unspecified' END as genderText from Person p left outer join napcoMPermissions n on p.NAPCOPermissionId = n.PermissionID inner join CompanyInfo c on c.companyid = p.companyid inner join DepartmentInfo d on d.departmentid = p.deptid inner join LocationInfo l on l.Locationid = p.LocationId inner join Person s on s.Personid = p.SupervisorId where personid = :personid
queries.personnelgrid: SELECT lastname as "Last Name", frstname as "First Name", PersonId, Badge, aGroupNo, Facility, Badge as "Badge No", Enabled, caObjectId, ActvDate as "Activation Date", ExprDate as "Expiration Date", LastUpdated as "Last Edit" FROM ca_vw_Personnel
queries.readerenabledlookup: select r.ManualPriv, r.pnlref, r.ReaderName as description, r.RdrNo , p.paneltype from reader r inner join panel p on p.pnlno = r.pnlref where r.enabled = 1
queries.readergrid: select PnlRef ,RdrNo ,caObjectID ,SUBSTR(PnlRef || '',1,2) || '- ' || SUBSTR(RdrNo || ' ',1,3) ,ReaderName as "Device Name" ,Enabled ,ExtShunt as "Ext Shunt" ,Escort ,RptByp as "Rpt Bypass" ,BypUnlock as "Byp Unlocks" ,OpnWait as "Rpt After Open" ,NoOTL as "Suppress OTL" ,Type ,LastUpdated as "Last Edit" from reader order by pnlref,rdrno
queries.readerlookup: select RdrNo as "ValueMember", ReaderName as "DisplayMember" from Reader where pnlref = :pnlref
queries.readerlookupjoin: select r.PnlRef ,p.PanelName as PnlRefText ,r.TAType , CASE r.TAType WHEN (0) THEN N'None' ELSE v.readername END as TATypeText ,r.Ctz ,t1.Description as CtzText ,r.Fatz ,t2.Description as FatzText ,r.DegrSchedule ,t3.Description as DegrScheduleText ,r.Cctz ,t4.Description as CctzText ,r.Cytz ,t5.Description as CytzText ,r.OTLSchedule ,t6.Description as OTLScheduleText ,r.LockCtl , CASE r.LockCtl WHEN (0) THEN 'On Open - relay is released as soon as the door contact is broken' WHEN (1) THEN 'On Close - relay is released when when door contact is closed' WHEN (2) THEN 'On Timeout - use the timer value set for Door Strike Time' END AS LockCtlText ,r.TAAPBType , CASE r.TAAPBType WHEN (0) THEN 'None - no events will be reported' WHEN (16) THEN 'In - reader will report Badge Clock In event Messages and In/Out status of a card holder will be changed to In' WHEN (32) THEN 'Out - reader will report Badge Clock out event Messages and In/Out status of a card holder will be changed to Out' WHEN (48) THEN 'In/Out - bi-directional capable reader - clock in for forward swipe clock out for reverse swipe' END AS TAAPBTypeText ,r.ManRule , CASE r.ManRule WHEN (0) THEN 'None - reader is not a two person reader' WHEN (1) THEN 'In - reader acts as a Two Person In reader' WHEN (2) THEN 'Out - reader acts as a Two Person Out reader' WHEN (3) THEN 'Out w/Override - Two Person Out reader, but permits one remaining occupant to exit' WHEN (4) THEN 'Always - reader always requires two badge reads to permit entry to a door' END AS ManRuleText ,r.APBType , CASE r.APBType WHEN (0) THEN 'IN - Anti-Passback in reader' WHEN (1) THEN 'OUT - Anti-Passback out reader' WHEN (2) THEN 'NEUTRAL - Anti-Passback is disabled' END AS APBTypeText ,r.APBEntry , CASE r.APBEntry WHEN (255) THEN N'IN - Anti-Passback in reader' ELSE a1.Description END AS APBEntryText ,r.APBExit , CASE r.APBExit WHEN (255) THEN N'IN - Anti-Passback in reader' ELSE a2.Description END AS APBExitText ,r.ManualPriv , CASE r.ManualPriv WHEN (0) THEN 'All' WHEN (1) THEN 'Priv 1' WHEN (2) THEN 'Priv 2' WHEN (3) THEN 'Priv 3' WHEN (4) THEN 'Priv 4' WHEN (5) THEN 'Priv 5' WHEN (6) THEN 'Priv 6' WHEN (7) THEN 'Priv 7' WHEN (8) THEN 'Priv 8' END AS ManualPrivText from reader r left outer join Panel p on r.PnlRef = p.PnlNo left outer join reader v on r.TAType = v.RdrNo and v.pnlref = :PnlRef left outer join MTimezon t1 on r.Ctz = t1.TzNum left outer join MTimezon t2 on r.Fatz = t2.TzNum left outer join MTimezon t3 on r.DegrSchedule = t3.TzNum left outer join MTimezon t4 on r.Cctz = t4.TzNum left outer join MTimezon t5 on r.Cytz = t5.TzNum left outer join MTimezon t6 on r.OTLSchedule = t6.TzNum left outer join APBAreas a1 on r.APBEntry = a1.AreaNo left outer join APBAreas a2 on r.APBExit = a2.AreaNo where r.PnlRef = :PnlRef and r.RdrNo = :RdrNo
queries.relayenabledlookup: select r.ManualPriv,r.pnlref,r.relayname as description,r.relno ,p.paneltype from relay r inner join panel p on p.pnlno = r.pnlref where r.enabled = 1
queries.relaygrid: select PnlRef ,RelNo ,caObjectID ,SUBSTR(PnlRef || ' ',1, 2) || '- ' || SUBSTR(RelNo || ' ',1,3) as "Panel/Relay" ,relayname as "Device Name" ,Enabled as Enable ,XactRpt as "Report Activity" ,Dialup as "Dial On Change" ,NormOn as "Normally Energized" ,RelTime as "Energize Time" ,TrackTz as "Track Schedule" ,Priority as "Alert Priority" ,LastUpdated as "Last Edit" from relay order by pnlref,relno
queries.relaylookup: select RelNo as "ValueMember", Relayname as "DisplayMember" from Relay
queries.relaylookupjoin: select r.PnlRef ,p.PanelName as PnlRefText ,r.TrackTz ,t.Description as TrackTzText ,r.ManualPriv , CASE r.ManualPriv WHEN (0) THEN 'All' WHEN (1) THEN 'Priv 1' WHEN (2) THEN 'Priv 2' WHEN (3) THEN 'Priv 3' WHEN (4) THEN 'Priv 4' WHEN (5) THEN 'Priv 5' WHEN (6) THEN 'Priv 6' WHEN (7) THEN 'Priv 7' WHEN (8) THEN 'Priv 8' END AS ManualPrivText from relay r left outer join Panel p on r.PnlRef = p.PnlNo left outer join MTimezon t on r.TrackTz = t.TzNum Where r.PnlRef = :PnlRef and r.RelNo = :RelNo
queries.rolelookup: select RoleId as "ValueMember", RoleName as "DisplayMember" from roles
queries.schedeventlookupjoin: select s.schedule ,t.Description as scheduleText from schedevent s left outer join MTimezon t on s.Schedule = t.TzNum Where s.schId = :schId
queries.scheduledchangegrid: select Description as "Description Text" ,CASE Device WHEN (1) THEN 'Doors' WHEN (3) THEN 'Inputs' WHEN (4) THEN 'Relays' WHEN (7) THEN 'Links' ELSE 'None' END as "Device Name" ,StartDate as "Start Date" ,EndDate as "End Date" ,IsActive as Active ,caObjectID from schedevent
queries.ScheduleLookup: Select ScheduleID as "ValueMember", ScheduleName as "DisplayMember" from AlarmLink_Schedule
queries.schedulesgrid: select TzNum as "No:", Description as "Description Text" ,LastUpdated as "Last Edit" ,caObjectID from mtimezon
queries.ScheduleTypeLookup: Select ID as "ValueMember", TypeName as "DisplayMember" from AlarmLink_scheduleType
queries.scriptEditorGrid: Select ScriptID,ScriptName as "Script Name", ScriptText, Changed, generateEvent, executeEventPriority, caObjectID, ScriptLanguage From alarmLink_Scripts
queries.scriptEventLookUpByScriptID: select T.ScriptTypeID AS "ScriptTypeID", T.ScriptStatus AS "ScriptStatus", T.ScriptStatusName AS "ScriptStatusName" from ScriptWizard_TypeStatus T where T.ScriptTypeID = :ScriptTypeID
queries.ScriptLink: select * from AlarmLink_ScriptLinks where cat = :cat and pnlNo = :pnlNo and DeviceNo = :DeviceNo and status = :status and workstationID = :workstationID and facility = :facility and badge = :badge
queries.scriptLookup: select scriptID as "ValueMember", scriptName as "DisplayMember" from alarmLink_scripts
queries.scriptLookup_WithGUID: select scriptID as "ValueMember", scriptName as "DisplayMember", caObjectID AS "caObjectID" from alarmLink_scripts
queries.scriptScheduleGrid: Select ScheduleID AS "ScheduleID", ScheduleName AS "ScheduleName", IsScheduleEventDependent AS "IsScheduleEventDependent", ScriptID AS "ScriptID", ScheduleEnabled AS "ScheduleEnabled", ScheduleTypeID AS "ScheduleTypeID", ScheduleDateTime AS "ScheduleDateTime", caObjectID AS "caObjectID", LastUpdated AS "LastUpdated", RunIfOperatorLoggedOn AS "RunIfOperatorLoggedOn", cat AS "cat", pnlNo AS "pnlNo", DeviceNo AS "DeviceNo", status AS "status", facility AS "facility", Badge AS "Badge", workstationID AS "workstationID" from AlarmLink_Schedule
queries.scriptServerLookup: select workstationID as "ValueMember", pollingUNCName as "DisplayMember" From ScriptingServers
queries.ScriptTypeLookup: select scriptTypeID as "ValueMember", ScriptTypeName as "DisplayMember" From ScriptWizard_Types
queries.ScriptTypeStatusLookup: select scriptStatus as "ValueMember", ScriptStatusName as "DisplayMember" From ScriptWizard_TypeStatus
queries.ScriptWizard_Input_GetALL: select PnlRef,InpNo, InputName, InpNo as "ValueMember",InputName || ' (' ||CAST(InpNo as nvarchar2(10)) || ')' as "DisplayMember" from Input
queries.ScriptWizard_Link_GetALL: select PnlRef, ProgNo, LinkName, ProgNo as "ValueMember",LinkName||' ('||CAST(ProgNo as nvarchar2(10)) ||')' as "DisplayMember" from Link
queries.ScriptWizard_MessageTemplate_GetALL: Select TemplateID as "ValueMember", Subject as "DisplayMember", Body, AllowSNPP,AllowEmail,AllowSMS,Include from MessageTemplates
queries.ScriptWizard_NapcoEventDef_GetALL: select StatusCode, EventHandlerType, EventMsgText, StatusCode as "ValueMember",EventMsgText||' ('||CAST(statusCode as nvarchar2(10))||')' as "DisplayMember" from NapcoEventdef
queries.ScriptWizard_NapcoPanel_GetALL: select AlarmPanelID AS "AlarmPanelID" , WorkstationID AS "WorkstationID", PanelType AS "PanelType", PanelName AS "PanelName",AlarmPanelID as "ValueMember", PanelName||' ('||CAST(AlarmPanelID as nvarchar2(10))||')' "DisplayMember" from NapcoPanels
queries.ScriptWizard_NapcoPanelArea_GetALL: select AlarmPanelID, AreaNumber,AreaConfigured, AreaName,AreaNumber as "ValueMember",AREANAME||' ('|| CAST(AreaNumber as nvarchar2(10))||')' as "DisplayMember" from NapcoPanelAreas where AreaConfigured = 1
queries.ScriptWizard_NapcoPanelRelays_GetALL: select AlarmPanelID, RelayNumber, RelayName,AlarmPanelID as "ValueMember", RelayName||' ('||CAST(AlarmPanelID as nvarchar2(10))||')' as "DisplayMember" from napcoPanelRelays
queries.ScriptWizard_NapcoPanelZones_GetALL: select AlarmPanelID, ZoneNumber, AreaNumber, ZoneName,ZoneNumber as "ValueMember",ZoneName||' ('|| CAST(AlarmPanelID as nvarchar2(10))||')' as "DisplayMember" from NapcoPanelZones
queries.ScriptWizard_Operator_GetALL: select OperatorID AS "OperatorID", OperLName||' ,' ||OperFName AS "FullName", EmailID AS "EmailID", PagerID AS "PagerID", OperLogInName AS "OperLogInName" from operators where OperUseEmail =1 or OperUseEMail=1
queries.ScriptWizard_Panel_GetALL: select PnlNo ,PanelName,PnlNo as "ValueMember",PanelName||' ('||CAST(pnlNo as nvarchar2(10))||')' as "DisplayMember" from panel
queries.ScriptWizard_Privilage_GetALL: select privilegeID, PrivilegeName,PrivilegeID as "ValueMember",PrivilegeName||' ('||CAST(privilegeID as nvarchar2(10)) ||')' as "DisplayMember" from privilege
queries.ScriptWizard_Reader_GetALL: select pnlRef,RdrNo,ReaderName,RdrNo as "ValueMember",ReaderName ||' (' ||CAST(rdrNo as nvarchar2(10))||')' as "DisplayMember" from Reader
queries.ScriptWizard_Relay_GetALL: select PnlRef, RelNo, RelayName,RelNo as "ValueMember", RelayName||' (' || CAST(RelNo as nvarchar2(10))||')' as "DisplayMember" from Relay
queries.ScriptWizard_ScriptServer_GetALL: select workstationID as WorkstationID, pollingUNCName, WorkstationID as "ValueMember", pollingUNCName||' ('||CAST(workstationID as nvarchar2(10))||')' as "DisplayMember" From ScriptingServers
queries.ScriptWizard_ScriptTypes_GetALL: select scriptTypeID, ScriptTypeName, scriptTypeID as "ValueMember", ScriptTypeName ||' ('|| CAST(scriptTypeID as nvarchar2(10))||')' as "DisplayMember" From ScriptWizard_Types
queries.ScriptWizard_ScriptTypeStatus_GetALL: select ScriptTypeID, ScriptStatus, ScriptStatusName, ScriptStatus as "ValueMember", ScriptStatusName||' ('||CAST(scriptstatus as nvarchar2(10))||')' as "DisplayMember" From ScriptWizard_TypeStatus
queries.SetBadgeAPB: UPDATE badge SET APBSet = :APBSet , Flag = 1, LastUpdated = :LastUpdated , LastOperator =:LastOperator, LastWorkstation = :LastWorkstation WHERE Facility = :Facility AND Badge = :Badge
queries.SingleLinkEnabledLookUp: select l.ManualPriv,l.pnlref,l.linkname as description,l.progno ,p.paneltype from link l inner join panel p on p.pnlno = l.pnlref where l.enabled = 1 and l.PnlRef = :PnlRef AND l.progno=:ProgNo
queries.singlereaderenabledlookup: select r.ManualPriv, r.pnlref, r.readername as description, r.RdrNo as deviceno , p.paneltype from reader r inner join panel p on p.pnlno = r.pnlref where r.enabled = 1 and r.PnlRef = :PnlRef AND r.RdrNo=:RdrNo
queries.singlerelayenabledlookup: select r.ManualPriv,r.pnlref,r.relayname as description,r.relno ,p.paneltype from relay r inner join panel p on p.pnlno = r.pnlref where r.enabled = 1 and r.pnlref=:PnlRef and r.relno = :RelNo
queries.snppproviderslookup: select snppHostID as "ValueMember", snppHostName as "DisplayMember" from snppProviders
queries.smsproviderslookup: select smsHostID as "ValueMember", smsHostName as "DisplayMember" from smsProviders
queries.systemsettings: select UseHoliday ,UseNAPCOPermissions ,UseAlp ,SysBadgeLen ,TagType ,UseVideo ,GUIViewMode ,UseAPBAreas ,UseCatCounters ,AGCountPerBadge ,UseFacBadge ,HidePinCode --,TapiId1 --,TapiId2 , AutoAckPriority, UseAutoAck ,BadgingOption ,UseBadging from systemsettings where sysid = :sysid
queries.timescheduleList: select TzNum as "ValueMember", Description as "DisplayMember" from MTimezon
queries.timeschedulelookup: select TzNum as "ValueMember", Description as "DisplayMember" from MTimezon
queries.timezonegrid: select CASE DayFrom WHEN (8) THEN 'HOL' WHEN (1) THEN 'SUN' WHEN (2) THEN 'MON' WHEN (3) THEN 'TUE' WHEN (1) THEN 'WED' WHEN (2) THEN 'THU' WHEN (3) THEN 'FRI' WHEN (7) THEN 'SAT' ELSE 'None' END as "Start Day" , CASE DayTo WHEN (8) THEN 'HOL' WHEN (1) THEN 'SUN' WHEN (2) THEN 'MON' WHEN (3) THEN 'TUE' WHEN (1) THEN 'WED' WHEN (2) THEN 'THU' WHEN (3) THEN 'FRI' WHEN (7) THEN 'SAT' ELSE 'None' END as "End Day" ,SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(TimeFrom),12,8) as "Start Time" ,SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(TimeTo),12,8) as "End Time" from timezone where tzno=:tzno order by TzID
queries.timeZoneUnused: SELECT TzNum as TimeZoneID, Description FROM MTimeZon WHERE TzNum NOT IN(SELECT TzNum FROM MTimeZon where TzNum IN(SELECT TimeZoneID FROM ca_vw_ReaderAccessGroupTimeZon UNION ALL SELECT ETz FROM Link UNION ALL SELECT TrkTz FROM Link UNION ALL SELECT TrackTz FROM Relay UNION ALL SELECT InpTz FROM Input UNION ALL SELECT LimitSchedule FROM Input))
queries.timeZoneUsagesForInputByTimezoneID: SELECT CAST(PnlRef as nvarchar2(20))||'-' ||CAST(InpNo as nvarchar2(20))||' '|| inputname as "DisplayMember" FROM Input WHERE InpTz =:TimeZoneID OR LimitSchedule = :TimeZoneID
queries.timeZoneUsagesForLinkByTimezoneID: SELECT CAST(PnlRef as nvarchar2(20))||'-' || CAST(ProgNo as nvarchar2(20))||' '|| LinkName FROM Link WHERE ETz = :TimeZoneID OR TrkTz = :TimeZoneID
queries.timeZoneUsagesForMAccGrpByTimezoneID: SELECT Description as "DisplayMember" FROM MAccGrp WHERE AgrpNO IN(SELECT DISTINCT AccessGroupID FROM ca_vw_ReaderAccessGroupTimeZone WHERE TimeZoneID = :TimeZoneID )
queries.timeZoneUsagesForNodeByTimezoneID: SELECT NodeName FROM Nodes WHERE Schedule= :TimeZoneID
queries.timeZoneUsagesForReaderByTimezoneID: SELECT CAST(PnlRef as nvarchar2(20))||'-' || CAST(RdrNo as nvarchar2(20))||' '|| ReaderName as "DisplayMember" FROM Reader WHERE CTz = :TimeZoneID OR FATz = :TimeZoneID OR CYTz = :TimeZoneID OR DegrSchedule = :TimeZoneID
queries.timeZoneUsagesForRelayByTimezoneID: SELECT CAST(PnlRef as nvarchar2(20))||'-'|| CAST(RelNo as nvarchar2(20))||' '|| RelayName as "DisplayMember" FROM Relay WHERE TrackTz = :TimeZoneID
queries.timeZoneUsagesForSchedEventByTimezoneID: SELECT Description,GroupName FROM SchedEvent WHERE Schedule=:TimeZoneID
queries.timeZoneUsagesForSystemSettingsByTimezon: SELECT distinct RespReqTz FROM SystemSettings WHERE RespReqTz =:TimeZoneID
queries.tlmlookup: select NVL(lockouttext0,'lockouttext0') as "DisplayMember", 0 as "ValueMember" from systemsettings where sysid = :sysid union select NVL(lockouttext1,'lockouttext1') as "DisplayMember", 1 as "ValueMember" from systemsettings where sysid = :sysid union select NVL(lockouttext2,'lockouttext2') as "DisplayMember", 2 as "ValueMember" from systemsettings where sysid = :sysid union select NVL(lockouttext3,'lockouttext3') as "DisplayMember", 3 as "ValueMember" from systemsettings where sysid = :sysid union select NVL(lockouttext4,'lockouttext4') as "DisplayMember", 4 as "ValueMember" from systemsettings where sysid = :sysid union select NVL(lockouttext5,'lockouttext5') as "DisplayMember", 5 as "ValueMember" from systemsettings where sysid = :sysid
