queries.TrackBadge: UPDATE badge SET Track = 1, Flag = 1, LastUpdated = :LastUpdated, LastOperator =:LastOperator, LastWorkstation =:LastWorkstation WHERE Facility = :Facility AND Badge = :Badge
queries.TrackPerson: UPDATE badge SET TRACK = 1, Flag = 1, LastUpdated = :LastUpdated , LastOperator =:LastOperator , LastWorkstation =:LastWorkstation WHERE PersonID = :PersonID
queries.typestatuslookup: select scriptStatus, scriptStatusName from scriptWizard_TypeStatus where scriptTypeID = :scriptTypeID
queries.UntrackBadge: UPDATE badge SET Track = 0, Flag = 1, LastUpdated = :LastUpdated, LastOperator = :LastOperator, LastWorkstation = :LastWorkstation WHERE Facility = Facility AND Badge = : Badge
queries.UntrackPerson: UPDATE badge SET TRACK = 0, Flag = 1, LastUpdated = :LastUpdated , LastOperator =:LastOperator , LastWorkstation =LastWorkstation WHERE PersonID = :PersonID
queries.UpdateBadgeFormatID:
UPDATE Badge Set EPI_FORMAT_ID = :FormatID
WHERE (PersonID = :PersonID) AND (Badge = :Badge) AND (Facility = :Facility)
queries.updatecategories: UPDATE CategoryCounters Set Flag = 0 WHERE PnlNo= :PnlNo
queries.UpdateMap: UPDATE Map SET MapID=:MapID, MapName=:MapName, MapDescription=:MapDescription, MapImage=:MapImage WHERE MapUID=:MapUID
queries.UpdatePanelType: UPDATE Panel SET PanelType=:PanelType WHERE PnlNo=:PnlNo
queries.userfielddef: select UserFieldName ,UserFieldID ,' ' as UserFieldValue from userfielddef
queries.vehicletagreaderlookup: select 0 as PnlRef, 0 as "ValueMember", N'None' as "DisplayMember" FROM Dual union select pnlRef, RdrNo as "ValueMember", readerName as "DisplayMember" from Reader
queries.workstationsettings: SELECT SysId ,UseMaps ,SyncClock ,UsePrinting ,ReportPrn ,EventPrn ,UseBadging ,EnableVideoService ,UseWirelessLocks ,Badgingoption ,EncodeSchema ,MaxEventView ,UseAlertSound ,AlertSoundInterval1 ,AlertSoundInterval2 ,AlertSoundInterval3 ,AlertSoundInterval4 ,AlertSoundName1 ,AlertSoundName2 ,AlertSoundName3 ,AlertSoundName4 ,AlertSoundPriority1 ,AlertSoundPriority2 ,AlertSoundPriority3 ,AlertSoundPriority4 ,AlertColor1 ,AlertColor2 ,AlertColor3 ,AlertColor4 ,GUIViewMode ,UIViewStyle ,ExportDir ,ImportDir ,MapsDir ,VideoCaptureDriver ,UseNAPCO ,UseScripting ,TapiPhone1 ,TapiPhone2 ,TapiId1 ,TapiId2 ,Flag ,LastUpdated FROM WorkStationSettings WHERE SysId = :SysId Order By SysId
queries.zonebyid: SELECT Description FROM ca_vw_Zones where ZoneId = :ZoneId
queries.zonelookup: SELECT ZoneId AS "ValueMember", Description AS "DisplayMember" FROM ca_vw_Zones order by description

items.item: On Open - relay is released as soon as the door contact is broken
On Close - relay is released when when door contact is closed
On Timeout - use the timer value set for Door Strike Time
None - no events will be reported
In - reader will report Badge Clock In event Messages and In/Out status of a card holder will be changed to In
Out - reader will report Badge Clock out event Messages and In/Out status of a card holder will be changed to Out
In/Out - bi-directional capable reader - clock in for forward swipe clock out for reverse swipe
None - reader is not a two person reader
In - reader acts as a Two Person In reader
Out - reader acts as a Two Person Out reader
Out w/Override - Two Person Out reader, but permits one remaining occupant to exit
Always - reader always requires two badge reads to permit entry to a door
Modem - use Dial Up to connect

accessgroupsgrid.finalselect: 1 AS Column1 , caObjectID , Description , AgrpNo , NULL AS Column2 , LastUpdated , '' AS Column3 , 1 AS Column4 , NULL AS Column5 , NULL AS Column6 , NULL AS Column7 , NULL AS Column8 , NULL AS Column9 , NULL AS Column10 , NULL AS Column11 , NULL AS Column12 , NULL AS Column13 ,NULL AS Column14

accessgroupslookup.finalselect: 1 AS Column1 , ca_fn_NEWID AS Column2 , 'No Access' as Description , 0 AS Column3 , NULL AS Column4 , SYSTIMESTAMP AS Column5 , '' AS Column6 , 1 AS Column7 , NULL AS Column8 , NULL AS Column9 , NULL AS Column10 , NULL AS Column11 , NULL AS Column12 , NULL AS Column13 , NULL AS Column14 , NULL AS Column15 , NULL AS Column17 ,NULL AS Column18 ,0 union select 1 , ca_fn_NEWID , Description , AgrpNo , NULL , SYSTIMESTAMP , '' , 1 , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL ,NULL

queries.qAccessGroup: SELECT AccGrp.Agno, AccGrp.PnlRef, MAccGrp.Description FROM AccGrp INNER JOIN MAccGrp ON AccGrp.Agno = MAccGrp.AgrpNo AND AccGrp.caObjectID IN (SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID)
queries.qAccessGroupReport: SELECT MAG.Agrpno AgNo, MAG.Description AgDesc, AG.PnlRef PnlNo, P.Description PnlDesc, R.RdrNo RdNo, R.Description RdDesc, MAG.LastUpdated LastEdit, AG.Tz1, AG.Tz2, AG.Tz3, AG.Tz4, AG.Tz5, AG.Tz6, AG.Tz7, AG.Tz8, AG.Tz9, AG.Tz10, AG.Tz11, AG.Tz12, AG.Tz13, AG.Tz14, AG.Tz15, AG.Tz16, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AccGrp WHERE Agno = MAG.AgrpNo) >0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS HasDetail FROM MAccGrp MAG LEFT JOIN AccGrp AG ON MAG.AgrpNo = AG.AGNO LEFT JOIN Panel P ON AG.PnlRef = P.PnlNo LEFT JOIN Reader R On AG.PnlRef = R.PnlRef WHERE MAG.AgrpNo > 0 1Sep AND AG.Agno BETWEEN :Agno1 AND :Agno2 1Sep AND AG.Agno = :Agno1 1Sep
queries.qAccessGroupReport1: SELECT TzNum, Description FROM MTimeZon WHERE TzNum > 0 AND caObjectID IN (SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID)
queries.qAlertResponseReport: SELECT R.Description FROM Resp R ORDER BY R.Description ASC
queries.qReaderForTimeAndAttendance: SELECT R.PnlRef AS "PnlRef", R.RdrNo AS "RdrNo", R.Description AS "Description", R.APBType AS "APBType" FROM Reader R WHERE R.APBType NOT IN(2) AND R.caObjectID IN (SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID)
queries.qFacilityCodeReport: SELECT F.PnlRef, P.Description, NVL(F.Facil1,0) Facil1, NVL(F.Facil2,0) Facil2, NVL(F.Facil3,0) Facil3, NVL(F.Facil4,0) Facil4, NVL(F.Facil5,0) Facil5, NVL(F.Facil6,0) Facil6, NVL(F.Facil7,0) Facil7, NVL(F.Facil8,0) Facil8, NVL(F.Facil9,0) Facil9, NVL(F.Facil10,0) Facil10, F.LastUpdated, F.Flag FROM Facility F INNER JOIN Panel P ON P.PnlNo=F.PnlRef WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY F.PnlRef

queries.qAPBReaders: SELECT PnlRef,RdrNo,ReaderName FROM Reader WHERE APBType = 0 OR APBType > 16 OR APBEntry > 0 AND caObjectID IN (SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID) ORDER BY ReaderName

queries.qInListReport3: SELECT ALL NVL(P.LastName, '') || NVL(P.FrstName, '') || NVL(P.MiddleName, '') AS Name, I.Badge, I.Reader, I.Time, AA.Description AS APBArea, I.APBIn FROM InList@EventDBLink I INNER JOIN APBAreas AA ON I.APBArea=AA.AreaNo INNER JOIN Person P ON P.PersonID = I.PersonID WHERE APBArea = :fieldOne

queries.qBadgeHolderName: SELECT ALL * FROM ca_vw_GetPersonnelAccessList 1Sep WHERE (1=1) 1Sep AND BadgeID=:BadgeID
queries.qBadgeSearchCriteria: AND BadgeID BETWEEN 1Sep AND 1Sep AND DoorShunt= 1Sep AND DepartmentName= 1Sep AND Location= 1Sep AND ValidateOn>= 1Sep AND InvalidateOn>= 1Sep AND HireDate>= 1Sep AND LastEdited>= 1Sep AND LVAccessDate 1Sep AND IsEnabled=1 1Sep AND IsEnabled=0 1Sep AND IsTracked=1 1Sep AND IsResident=1 1Sep AND IsResident=0 1Sep AND IsEscort=1 1Sep AND IsDoorShunt=1 1Sep AND IsDedicated=1 1Sep ORDER BY 1Sep AND AccessGroupID=
queries.qGetTemplate: SELECT Name AS "Name", RptType AS "RptType", Period, Previous, Filter, DevList,Data1, Data2, Data3, Data4, Data5, Data6, Data7, Data8, Data9, Data10, Data11, Data12,Data13, Data14, Data15, Data16, Data17, Data18, Data19, Data20, Data21, Data22, Data23, Data24, Data25, Data26, Data27, Data28,Data29, Data30, Data31, Data32, Data33, Data34, Data35, Data36, Data37, Data38, Data39, Data40 FROM Template T WHERE T.RptType = 2 ORDER BY Name ASC
queries.qTimeAndAttendanceReport: ORDER BY E.FacNo, E.Badge, E.EDate 1Sep AND E.EDate BETWEEN :dateFrom AND :dateTo 1Sep FullName 1Sep AND P.LastName = :LastName AND P.FrstName = :FrstName 1Sep AND P. 1Sep AND ( 1Sep (PnlNo = 1Sep AND DeviceNo = 1Sep ) 1Sep OR 1Sep SELECT B.caObjectID, E.Name AS ReaderName, E.Name, P.LastName, E.PnlNo, E.DeviceNo, E.EDate, E.Status, P.frstName, B.Badge FROM 1Sep Event E INNER JOIN Badge@ConfigDBLink B ON E.Badge = B.Badge AND E.FacNo = B.Facility INNER JOIN ca_vw_Person@ConfigDBLink P ON P.PersonID = B.PersonID 1Sep WHERE E.Cat IN(0,8) 1Sep AND (E.Status IN(2,3,18,19) OR E.Status BETWEEN 6 AND 9 OR E.Status > 23) 1Sep AND (E.Status BETWEEN 6 AND 9) 1Sep AND B.PersonID IN(SELECT UF.PersonID FROM UserFields@ConfigDBLink UF WHERE UF.UserFieldID=:UserFieldID AND B.PersonID = UF.PersonID) 1Sep
queries.qUserFieldDef: SELECT UserFieldID AS "UserFieldID", UserFieldName AS "UserFieldName" FROM UserFieldDef WHERE caObjectID IN (SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID) ORDER BY UserFieldName
queries.qBadgesForTimeAndAttendance: SELECT ALL P.caObjectID AS "caObjectID", P.CoID AS "CoID", P.Location AS "Location", P.Dept AS "Dept", P.Contact AS "Contact", P.FrstName AS "FrstName", P.LastName AS "LastName", NVL(P.LastName,'') || ', ' || NVL(P.FrstName,'') AS "FullName" FROM Person P WHERE P.caObjectID IN (SELECT caObjectID FROM OperatorPartitions where OperatorID = :OperatorID)
queries.qSystemSettingsPartOneGetAll: SELECT ALL * FROM ca_vw_SystemSettingsOne WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY systemID ASC
